It is the duty of a soul guide to lead the lost souls onto the right path, to help them move on to the next life. This lamp, powered by a mysterious orb created long ago by a dragon from a distant land, is a treasure of the Tamians. The orb at its core allows nearby souls to materialize, making it possible for its wielder to talk to them directly. As such, it is the ultimate medium for a soul guide. Tamian chieftains have used this relic to carry out the sacred duties of a soul guide for generations. Now, in the face a great danger that threatens the world, the lamp has been passed on to Rephy, the most powerful soul guide in existence.

A treasure of the Dark Elves created using a powerful moonlight stone from Arrovina and a moon tree branch of the highest quality. Nerius is a perfect medium for Moonlight Magic, and it is one of the most powerful magic weapons of the Dark Elves. However, it is said that the beautiful silver light of the moon can easily be tainted by darkness. A sublime love has turned into deep darkness, and the dark elf longing for vengeance has fused that darkness into this weapon.

The Stein family boasts a long lineage that dates back to the early days of the empire. The honor of the family, however, stems from the skills of its warriors, not its noble bloodline. Aria Stein was a legendary master of the blade. Remembered as one of the most skilled warriors in the history of the empire, she laid the foundation of the Stein family honor. Reina is her descendant. Aria's sword, Livatas, currently belongs to Reina. Light as a feather yet strong enough to withstand any strike, this sword helped Reina earn the nickname 'Flash.'

Andarta and Andraste were two dragons who were defeated by the Demons during the war. They were a pair connected at the soul. They were lovers who understood each other better than anyone. Even as they lay dying, they refused to stay apart, and made one final request to Pavel, their comrade. Pavel granted their final wish by transferring their souls into their hearts, and then turning them into a pair of gems. Even though the two have lost their bodies, they remain together, and as inseparable as ever.

One day, a vein exuding powerful mana was discovered in the territory of Ziltrion. While investigating, Demia found a blue ore, the likes of which she had never seen before. Numerous wizards and alchemists studied this mysterious ore with the characteristics of both gem and metal, but no one could figure out its identity. Jin the blacksmith, however, had a different idea. As soon as he saw the ore, he offered Demia to craft powerful gears out of it, with a big smile on his face. With it, he forged a lance and a shield, glowing blue with mana and tougher than diamond.

A cursed pair of gauntlets crafted from the claws of the Mad Demon Baroro, which was defeated during the war. Several times the size of the average human hands, these gauntlets directly connect to the nerves of the wearer, allowing the wielder to control them effortlessly. Although they grant immense power, they also break into the mind of the wearer, slowing eating away at the soul. Only a true warrior of noble conviction, strong will and undying spirit may handle these cursed weapons. They are the perfect weapons for a warrior with a strong will that shines even in the darkness of the abyss.

The essence of the most sophisticated imperial technology. Requiring superhuman precision, this rifle cannot be handled by a regular person. It has been magically enchanted to allow the shooter to see impossibly long distances. Even the greatest scope in the world, however, is useless in the hands of someone who can't aim with it. As such, the performance of this rifle has significantly depended on the skills of its users. Rodina, gifted with superb vision and precise control, is a suitable owner of this rifle. She went one step further and customized it to her preference, naming it Rodina Custom.

In the heart of the Dragia Volcano, there exists a smithy. Hundreds of years ago, Temeraire, the ancient fire dragon, created a set of magically enchanted gear. Using lava infused with the power of the volcanic fire, he forged a shield and a sword capable of incinerating anything. During the war against Demons, Temeraire presented these to a human warrior. Unfortunately, the warrior is said to have been defeated by Morrah. No one has seen this legendary gear since then. That is, until Morrah reappeared on the front line.

Even among the holy relics bestowed to the high priests of the Church of Lua, the God's Book Genesis is special. According to the legend, this book, guarded throughout the ages by the Grand Priests of the church, was written by Lua herself. Iris, the current Grand Priest, upon receiving a revelation regarding Baudouin, entrusted this book to his step father, Berman. Later, the book was given to Baudouin when he became a high priest. It is said that this divine relic provides infinite holy energy to its owner, along with the power to unlock the true potential of those who have faith.

When Malduk's magic resurrected Jane as an undead, she should not have felt anything. Yet, she felt warm and comfortable as mysterious energy surrounded her dead body. She should not have been able to even feel it. But when Malduk took her, she instinctively reached out to the warm presence. Later, when a mysterious magic brought her back to consciousness, the first thing she did was to inspect her coffin, which radiated with tragic yet warm love. Inside, she found the following message carefully engraved: 'My unchanging love for you.'

In the Tower of Sage, the title of Purple indicates the pinnacle of mana capacity. Aisha's seemingly endless mana was simply too much for regular means of output. For this reason, the von Daphnel family bought out all the best mana stones they could find, and took them to Annette, the best technomagi in Orvel Castle. Annette gladly agreed to take on this new project. Soon after, she created Mahitra, a beautiful umbrella befitting an aristocratic wizard of noble destiny.

The phoenix is a holy beast that symbolizes eternal life. As elusive as the beast itself is, its feather is considered extremely rare as well. It is said that a quill crafted from a phoenix feather is a powerful magical tool in its own right. Runes drawn with this quill can serve as a powerful medium for Rune Magic.

A set of enchanted weapons bestowed upon Fluss's grandfather, a knight hailing from the Republic of Gray, and passed down as family treasures. They are capable of gradually enhancing the physical abilities of their wielder, allowing him to break the boundaries of human limitations and gain supernatural power and speed. Because the effect is gradual, there is no sudden stress to the wielder's body. Each piece is called Blood and Rose, respectively. The names originated from the swirl of blood splatter and flower petals that follow whenever Fluss swings these twin swords. No other warrior has been able to utilize their potential as Fluss does.

A slingshot made from hyacinth, a silver tree that only grows in extremely cold regions. It is said that hyacinths have been blessed by the Queen of Ice, and are able to bear bright red fruits even in the coldest weather. Simply holding onto a hyacinth branch allows one to ignore the coldness around the holder. These blessed trees also have the power to call upon snowstorms and frost. Needless to say, these powers are best harnessed by a weapon carved from one of these trees.

An ankh crafted in the shape of a phoenix. It symbolizes the natural cycle of life. In the ancient days, the nomads of the desert worshipped the blue dragon of the oasis as their protector. In return, she blessed them with rain and gave life to their crops. To show their gratitude, the nomads offered her various treasures, including Lazulia, the gem of water. Although she had no particular interest in material wealth, she accepted their gratitude, and used the treasures to build a temple within the oasis. This ankh is the sacred symbol of the temple, and contains the mighty power of water.

A powerful weapon of light that can take the form of a spear, a dagger, or a bow. One of the divine treasures of the Angels blessed by an archangel. It is said to be capable of incinerating evil. Due to its versatility, it has traditionally been given to the most talented scout. The number of Demons who perished under its light during the war is too high to count.

A staff of blood that has been passed down in the family of the Vampire Lord through the generations. Its crimson color symbolizes the authority, insight, and the absolute power of the Vampire Lord. Deep in the underground of the Galia Plains is the holy land of the Vampires. This legendary staff lies there, ready to appear at the call of the master worthy of it, wherever that may be.

There exists a universal string that connects different dimensions. This sword is the key that can sever and reconnect this string. It is bestowed upon the dimensional arbitrator sworn to protect the balance of the universe. It can be duplicated indefinitely, but will only grant its powers to the chosen one.

The essence of technomagic, created based on Annette's theory. Five of the highest-ranking court wizards of Orvel have poured their energy into creating this magical being. It has its own will, making it capable of making independent decisions and acting on them. While it shares its mana with Annette, it can also utilize any other available mana nearby. As such, it is the first great milestone in Annette's effort to make magic available to all.

A pair of magical weapons that absorb the bloodlust of their user to enhance their own firepower. Each pull of their triggers pushes the user deeper and deeper into the craze of the battle. It is said that when a master craftsman creates a weapon, it develops a soul. Berkinos seem to have the soul of the war god. According to the story, when their creator pulled their triggers for the first time, he suddenly turned pale with terror and threw them into a river.

When the Holy Sword Aea was bestowed upon Kyle, it appeared in the Temple of Lua located north of the King's Plains. When Kyle removed the sword from the altar, it released a powerful wave of light that turned the entire vicinity into a sacred ground. Everything contained within the Temple was turned into holy relics. Teoria, the central pillar of the Temple, absorbed the greatest amount of holy energy of them all.

The Demon War dates back to 100 years ago. During this war, the greatest threat to mankind was, without a doubt, the high-ranking Demon officers. Kaitasis, the Demon of the Calm, was especially dangerous among them. Countless wizards and priests were slaughtered by this Demon who specifically targeted magic users for their souls. Eventually, Kaitasis was defeated by Kyle, and its core was sealed away. However, years later, the core came into the possession of the Laughing Mask and it once again served as an instrument of death.

Ezekiel's father was one of the highest-ranking Demons. Although he does not know his father's name or face, he is aware of the tremendous power of the Demon blood he inherited. The Demon blood flowing within his veins also gave him a second personality. When his human blood prevails, Ezekiel is a young man of excellent character. At other times, he is an immensely powerful and arrogant Demon, just like his father. Barbatos, Jailer of Despair, manifests itself when Ezekiel's Demon blood is in full power. Taking the form of one of his arms, this weapon is powerful enough to slash through dimensions and sever the space itself. It is the physical representation of his father's power.

Cassandra works double as an arms dealer. One day, a stolen item came into her possession which immediately caught her attention. It was a beautiful fan adorned with gold decorations and precious gems. According to the rumors, every single lady who possessed this fan soon fell into great misfortune. It has been circulating the market as a cursed item. As soon as she bought it, Cassandra began investigating its origin. As it turned out, this fan, named Goldbreeze, had been created to serve as a concealed weapon. It shouldn't be too hard to guess as to what kind of misfortune the unaware owners of this fan might have suffered.

A spear said to have been forged from a bolt of lightning. Electricity constantly flows around this impressive spear that stands as tall as an average adult male. Forging a spear from lightning was a tremendous task. But then again, Jin was no ordinary blacksmith. He smelted a huge mana stone infused with a red dragon's blood. He used this to contain the lightning before forging it into a spear. Aside from its chosen master, no person can touch this weapon. When its two pieces are combined, it lets out a tremendous flux of energy that resembles a dragon's roar.

The story goes back to when Mediana's poison experiments were still being kept secret from her peers. One day, a fellow doctor noticed the giant syringe she had made. Impressed by its sheer size, he asked her:
'Look at the size of that thing. Shouldn't you at least give it a name?'
To this, Mediana replied, nonchalantly:
'Oh... Just call it... Piston.'

After Oddy's watch was zapped with the Redpur curse and gained the power to control time over a living being, he used the infinite time he gained to research its possible applications. When he finally created a watch containing the essence of time magic after so many trials, Oddy found out that the secret of Redpur magic originated from moonlight and the shadow it creates. He named his masterpiece 'Tempodiana,' and gave it the nickname 'Moonshade Countdown.'

Nightmare Kitrax was known as the best, and the most terrifying, of the succubi. After devouring Kitrax whole, soul and all, Viska came up with her most powerful weapon yet. This spike is the physical manifestation of fear and despair. Death is the only fate of its unfortunate victims. It constantly injects fear into its victim's soul, reducing even the most formidable enemy to mere prey.

During her military career, Priscilla felled countless enemies with her halberd. Although the halberd fell into a state of disrepair following her retirement, it was later resurrected as Exilius. This upgrade was a part of the order sent to Annette to create Mahitra for Aisha. This razor-sharp and incredibly durable new weapon even has the magical power to draw its enemies in. Those who have seen Priscilla slaughtering her Demon foes using this halberd claim that it was like watching an unstoppable storm.

An enchanted weapon made from the bones, tendons, and pieces of hide the Mad Dragon Svelta. Too heavy for a normal human to even lift, let alone draw, this monstrous greatbow is a combination of the siege weapon technologies from the Dark Elves and Dwarves. Only those with incredible muscular strength such as Yanne can hope to handle this ridiculous bow. The Mad Dragon's soul still remains in this bow. Her ferocious energy rides on every arrow it fires, granting it the power to shatter through even the mightiest of walls.

An ancient Weapon forged for the most glorious being on earth. \nOnly permitted to the successor to the God King, one should undergo tremendous ordeals to prove his worth as its owner. \nThis bow, allowed only for the chosen successor to the God King, has absolute power in the desert.

Yuria's favorite set of thread, needle, and scissors.\nHer masterpieces were all made with these tools.\nThe thread with starlight from the night sky and the scissors and needle made from metal extracted from a meteorite give Yuria the power to read people's fate.

Tarot card reading is a common fortune telling method for witches. Some witches use customized cards to suit their personal styles. Ophelia's cards also function as the proof of the pacts between her and the creatures she summons. Quite popular as a guide of destiny among the entities of the mysterious dimensions, she has made pacts with countless creatures. Del Arcana, a powerful tarot deck carefully assembled by Ophelia, is the physical proof of these relationships.

On the surface, it’s just a big, complicated instrument.
However, there's more to this instrument than meets the eye.
Just a slight change to the sound generator component, this instrument transforms into a weapon that discharges special ultrasonic waves.
Even after swapping the part, all that one has to do to use this weapon is to play it. Anyone who can play the instrument can use this weapon, and its ease of use is its prime strength.
Rehartna crafted this weapon as an experiment after a sad realization that she couldn't do anything to help her comrades in case of sudden combat.
Realizing this weapon’s versatile use, Rehartna plans to mass-produce it.

A hyper-accurate blowgun made by Requina herself. A special muting piece added at the end makes this already-quiet weapon almost completely silent. As the appearance of Demons began to hurt her business, she decided to utilize anything she could, not just poisons. She sought help from her elementalist friend, who imbued the blowgun with the wind's blessing. This gave the weapon firepower equal to that of a magic cannon. After adding Requina's ultra-deadly, Demon-slaying poison to it, it became a powerful and deadly weapon capable of killing any living being.

Legends speak of a mysterious metal, gold as the glorious rays of the sun, blue as the pure sky, and white as the blinding light. This holy sword and shield set has been forged from that special metal that only Angels can handle. These are divine relics of protection, created to banish the darkness and fill the world with light. Bestowed only to the most righteous Guardian Knight of the Angels, these relics can instantly incinerate any Demon that faces their light.

It is unarguably the culmination of the latest imperial technomagi technology. It can transform into three modes, the last of which uses magic that is so devastating that its use has to be restricted. According to Valance, the head of the imperial weapons development organization MagosLe’Flamme, the new weapon Archistra was stolen, immediately after its development, by Crow, a former naval officer who was dishonorably discharged. It remains to be confirmed whether Crow really did manage to infiltrate one of the Empire's most important organizations to steal Archistra... It's also possible that Valance simply handed it over to him, given their long friendship.

Curses are born from negative feelings such as hatred, jealousy, and resentment. These are the best food for Shamilla. The wings that grew powerful during the Demon War by absorbing the curses of countless people are terrifying to normal people. Those who are touched by the feathers are said to be bound by many curses, and they fall into a vortex of emotions. In that abyss, a captivating and seductive laughter echoes. The laughter of a demon that enjoys the different kinds of human feelings.

Another spectral entity that got separated from Lavril.
Unlike kind Lavril, Dunn Nemecia is the amalgamation of the negative and aggressive souls that were inside her.
Fortunately, this cute but scary ghost keeps its evil side hidden most of the time and uses its powers only when its host needs it, or when it senses a threat.

But one must keep in mind that this strange ghost is not a nice, harmless being.

It pulls mischievous tricks such as laying pointy toys around a sleeping person, throwing a freshly cooked dish to the ground, and tripping passerby.
But it could do a lot more than just 'tricks' if it weren't in control of Lavril.

A sword of authority passed down to the masters of ShadowHilts.
This sword contains the power of mighty beings that made a pact to serve the ShadowHilts.
Some of them were Elementals, some were innocent spirits, and some even demons.
It is known that tens of thousands of evil forces fell to this sword.
It also has a demonic quality that binds the spirit of the slain evil to the blade.
Despite its great power, fewer than 5 people in 600 years that were able to wield this sword.
Seria, the 101st Heir of ShadowHilts and the only master in history chosen by the sword,
entered the pact with the sword to put her beloved sister to rest.

When did this all begin...?
This torment that comes with unending thirst...
But after quenching that thirst...
My heart throbs with burning hatred against you, Seria...
...Ah, Seria. I have no other choice.
I need this power to satisfy this endless thirst.
This ever-flowing essence of power is the only cure to my eternal torment.
Ah... This ecstasy...
More... Someone, thrill me more.

An infinite spring that endlessly spouts water. 
It is a jar made by the first Blue Dragon, who ruled all waters on earth.
It reacts to the imagination of the user. 
To a young, sensitive and creative girl like Lilia, it is the greatest treasure and weapon.

A rare treasure that is the manifestation of passion burning like a flame in the desert. 
A pair of these beautiful weapons is known to have been stored in the ancient God King's repositorium. 
When swung, they beautifully sound like the wind with the scent of a breeze. 
It is a sweet but lethal temptation, just like a mirage in the desert...

A blessed flag representing the Sun, Moon, and the entire sky.
It contains the power and teachings of the Creator, Lua.
The power of light spreads when he waves the flag,
bringing peace to his allies' minds, defeating the powers of darkness.
A halidom bestowed upon Lucias, who used to be a flag bearer in Lua's Holy Knights.

One of the newly invented weapons of Magos Le'Flamme, the researching organization of the Empire.
Akistra was developed to be a cannon with maximized killing power,
whereas Arc Lumineir was made as a multi-purpose strategic weapon.
Researchers, while studying to control the power of light,
combined the attribute of a light-dispersing ore and the principle of Technomagic that has its roots in Elemental Magic,
and came up with a brand new concept for an optical weapon.

A magic gear crafted with pitch-black metal called Adamantite, tempered with the dark flame and the lightning of a black dragon.
It holds the grudge and rage of black dragons that were killed during the Demon War.
Neraxis threatened the dwarves to forge this special weapon for him.
Then, he cursed and enchanted it with the grudge-filled souls of black dragons.
Anyone who touches this weapon beside Neraxis will hear the raging roars of vengeful dragons.

The most legendary sword in Orvelia. This sacred blade has been passed down the royal lineage of Orvelia since the kingdom's birth, symbolizing the true authority of the monarch. King Kyle used this sword as well, until he was chosen by the Holy Sword Aea. Blessed with the power of light, its blade can disable any magic by cutting through its flow. Only a knight of noble bloodline and righteous pride can wield this sword. Those who wish to lift it must pass the trial of the royal family, a feat only accomplished by Scarlet, aside from Kyle.

A sphere of electricity created by Sonia based on the beast core that is now her own heart. She has shown great talent in making magic gear, and this is the first weapon she ever created. It's a bit lacking in stability, mostly due to the overwhelming electricity it contains. The powerful electrical storm created by this weapon is truly dangerous for any enemy. In fact, anyone besides Sonia who touches it would be instantly fried by the immense current that flows through it.

This sacred treasure of Penteonia is said to have been sent from the Heavens to eradicate the Demons. This Light Staff, known to respond only to those worthy of sainthood, radiated with splendid light in the hands of the young Artemia, as if to honor the future empress. It calls upon the power of absolute light, unleashing heaven's vengeance upon its enemies while protecting its wielder with divine light.

A magic gear created by Sonia, the Archmage of Blue. It is enchanted with magic that allows it to reach incredible speeds. It is also enchanted with a special spell that always guides it back to its owner after it's thrown. It is the best gift Sonia could give to Mirianne, who is both a family and a friend to her. In other words, it's a unique expression of love reserved only for Mirianne.

This powerful and awe-inspiring equipment that can converse with their wielders, sometimes even dominating the owners themselves. Schwanheite is counted among these awesome weapons. This harp, which insists that it be called 'Mr. Schute,' can significantly amplify the wielder’s mana and spray it all around the wielder. Since the amplified mana is scattered about, it cannot be effectively used as offensive magic. However, depending on how it's used it can prove to be extremely effective in other ways. Mr. Schute is quite a chatterbox, but only to those he considers as his friends. These days he only talks to Shea.

An artifact from an ancient civilization that has an engine that provides unlimited power. It's a mighty weapon with the power of a siege weapon, and its power comes close to that of the highest-rank magic. This weapon was found in the ruins of the old Republic of Gray, but it remained in storage since no one knew how to use it. Long after that, Kara was excavated and once she awakened, it teleported to her side. The highest-ranking technomagic weapon that was made in a similar way as the Mountain Fortress.

A weapon forged from special metal that a shaman from Krakashu, the tribe of darkness, made by melting down living demonic beasts.
The metal was then forged by the best smith in the Jungle and was reborn as a magical weapon to punish demons.
A huge pair of claws embrace curse, grudge, and rage.
These claws are the symbol that represents the leader of Krakashu, and they're also a medium of the spell that appeases the wrath of their forefathers.
Nia became the tribe leader at such a young age and has yet to tap into all the darkness that the weapon holds,
but deep at night, often when she's about to fall asleep, she can hear the howling grudge of her forefathers from the weapon.

A pair dice once used by Hexipolia, the Wandering Illusion Clown.
He was a renowned mage and artist in ancient times who traveled all across the continent to give joy to people and help them forget their troubles.
His performance was a solace and hope to people living in confusing times, and they loved him to the extent that they made the Moon of Hexipolia after he passed away in honor of his noble spirit.
However, the mentally demanding nature of Hexipolia's craft slowly gnawed into his soul, making him suffer from loneliness and depression.
He wanted to give up on his natural gift, but the shadow cast upon people was just too deep; he knew too well what his performances meant to his audience.
It was his destiny to amuse people.

Lu Etrona Dice is what he made to amuse himself during his painful journey of entertainment.
He condensed his Mana into the dice and gave it the power to form a dimensional illusion.
When rolled, the dice opened up an imaginary world where Hexipolia could find some peace.

The dice was passed down to the descendants of his life-long pursuit for clowning, but it disappeared when the ancient civilization collapsed.

And now, the dice is in the hands of a man called the Illusion Gambler.
Being used in a completely different way, against its maker's intentions...

It is said that the dice appeared in Esker's hands with blinding lights when he desperately wanted to escape this world.

A pair of technomagical boots made mainly with the Magic Stone of Tempest excavated from the ancient technomagic ruins.
Whenever their wearer attacks, the magic stone releases an energy wave that allows the wearer to achieve supersonic speed and a power destructive enough to bend metal pillars like taffy.

In fact, it was Ricardo who gave Cecilia the Magic Stone of Tempest, the core material of these boots.
According to her, Ricardo was keeping it safe, though he never told her where he got it.

One day, Ricardo came to visit Cecilia in the Empire, and Cecilia told him that she would join the Resistance.
He saw from her eyes that her mind was set.
He then gave her the Magic Stone of Tempest, saying, 'Show the world what you believe in.'

Later, Landet, the geek engineer of the Resistance recognized the value of the Magic Stone and created these powerful boots.

Giant scissors created with crimson arcane crystals that form Kirze's body.
They are based on antique scissors her mother used to have.
It is a very versatile weapon that can be swung like a great sword or split into two like double swords.

The weapon is built with prayers of a girl who wants no one to be tormented by the Demons anymore.
These scissors resonate with her emotions to unleash greater power.

A weapon for Enhanced Human Type. 0 that was made after thousands of attempts in one of the laboratories of the empire. 
Enhanced Human Type. 0 destroyed everything as soon as he woke up from the laboratory in order to find a weapon that could withstand his power.
In the end, he tore out the horn of the monster Cannibal, which was known to have swallowed Arrogance out of the 7 sins. 
This horn went through the hands of the greatest blacksmiths of the empire and became the Blood Lancer Monolith.
The flame of sin is burning inside the weapon, and whatever it pierces cannot be healed. 
The feeling of striking with this weapon is pleasurable enough to make him forget about the lingering attachment to his lost memory.

A treasure of the tribe that was hidden deep inside Lake Eretana.
It contains hundreds of years of Lizardmen wisdom and magic.
Its power is normally calm like still water,
but this magical item can unleash devastating tsunami-like power if a user wishes to.

The name of this demonic sword means 'the one who cannot be satiated' and 'the one with ceaseless craving.'
It has the power to absorb all forms of energy, evil or holy, to use them as its own.
It has its own will, and a character that is very temperamental, scatterbrained, and cruel.
Even Queen Artemia does not know the exact reason why this demonic sword was sealed under the Central Church in Penteonia, but rumor says that Targarios was a Dark Lord in the distant past.
Considering its frivolous character, that might seem unlikely. However, there is no doubt that it has devastating powers.

A shield and a gunblade crafted with the cutting-edge mechanical engineering of the Empire.
The gunblade is a prototype made by the Department of Mechanical Engineering of Magos Le'Flamme, and it is a deadly weapon designed to attack multiple enemies at close range.
The shield was designed to parry and counterattack enemy strikes, and its ability to absorb and mitigate shock is unmatched.
It was a gift awarded by the royal family of the Empire in recognition of Glenwys's achievements after joining the Knights.

A curious basket always carried by May whenever she goes hunting for new materials. This mysterious basket contains an infinite amount of space, and turns anything that enters it weightless. This allows May to bring back a ridiculous number of items from a single trip. At a quick glance, it might as well be filled with picnic foods. However, rumors claim that, whenever she takes it to her hunting trips, she packs it with... ...Other questionable things. Or so they say.

A pair of gauntlets custom forged for Gladi. They are the proof of his winning the championship at the Orvel Arena. Supposedly, these were crafted from a legendary pair of gauntlets used by a man who was known as the War God hundreds of years ago. These gauntlets, specialized for smashing the opponent, greatly enhance the power of their wearer. However, the physical cost of using them is brutal, and no normal person can handle them. Unless the wearer is incredibly flexible, and physically capable of withstanding the impact of each blow, using them is almost suicidal. Nevertheless, Gladi's natural strength and flexibility allow him to use them freely.

Her approval is needed to process any important items in the Guild Alliance. An office item cherished by the founder of the Guild Alliance. A feather pen and folder put together in a set. The pen has a mana ball embedded in it so it requires mana instead of ink, and it must be used on a magic parchment that cannot be written on with a regular pen. The letters that are written by the writer cannot be erased without the writer's mana. Also, text can be written on the magic parchment without any limit, and it has a function to search for stuff one has written before. It makes Veronica's work that much more effective. Of course, it's useful when it's used for work, but outside of work...

The halberd held by an ancient guardian statue defending the gate of the labyrinth that was recently discovered at the Royal Underground. The old, eroded statue was holding the halberd firmly in its hands, as if showing its determination to protect the labyrinth against intruders. Loman, who was in charge of the labyrinth excavation, felt something indescribably sublime from the statue and showed due courtesy in front of it. At that moment, the statue dropped its halberd to the ground and began to crumble away. The halberd itself seemed unaffected by time and was imbued with a mysterious energy.
'That statue suddenly crumbled and dropped the halberd...'
Scarlet said, glancing over the report.
'Yes, ma'am.'
Scarlet then gazed at Loman.
'The unyielding sincerity of protecting a place until his very body collapses... I know a man like that.'
'Pardon, ma'am?'
He looked at Scarlet with a puzzled face as she handed over the halberd, smiling.

A magical pot known to have been used by a legendary chef in the distant past. It is made with magical metal that even Blacksmith Jin hasn't ever seen before. It has the effects of boosting the taste and aroma of the food, maximizing the natural quality of ingredients. It is such a rare treasure, but it is seldom used by its owner, Juno. As she has great pride in her culinary skills, people assume that she does not like to reply upon such magical artifacts.\nAs a result, the most precious treasure in the culinary world is now merely a decoration in Juno's inn. When the day comes that she decides to use it, however, the world will witness a whole new level of cooking.

The mace wielded by the Chief Guard to keep the inmates under control.
It is known as the Mace of Rehabilitation for the unruly monsters in captivity.
Although it was passed down from one Stockade Chief Guard in Orvelia to another across generations, soon after Nicky became the new chief, she broke a part of the mace while mercilessly swinging it at the prisoners.

- ... ... ...

She was staring at the broken mace when she turned her eyes to the prisoners. Her eyes stopped at the Hell Beast Hartnon whose entire body was covered with horns.
A cruel grin appeared on her face.

- You! You've got a pretty eyeball for a piece of trash!

In time, the monster's eye went through Blacksmith Jin's hands and became Nicky's new mace.
The new mace was perfect for her.
The horns sprouting from the mace exuded an excruciating curse, while the deep grudge ingrained in the monster's iris offering ensured a soul-crushing pain.
The inmates began to call the new mace 'Hartnon' in remembrance of the beast sacrificed for the weapon.
Nicky felt a surge of incomparable pleasure whenever she'd swing the new mace at the prisoners.

An ancient shield made with a drawing found in the Tower of Challenge and Artifact Pieces that were left over after restoration.
The shield holds ancient protective spells, whose limits remain unknown to the world.
Even Dosarta herself is not fully acquainted with its powers, but she doesn't really care either.
'I have plenty of time to play around with it and figure out what it does,' was what she said.
Guarding the Tower of Challenge was so boring that even training her skills became a pastime for her.

At one point, Hanus, in a greatly enraged state, utilized all of her knowledge and skills she possessed to craft this enigmatic firearm.
She uses this weapon against a target who makes her angry.

This deadly weapon named Hanus Type-0 is loaded with special bullets that corrodes the target's body upon hit. Not only that, this weapon also fires a tracking bullet now and then, making it impossible for a target to escape Hanus.
If anyone could create this intricate firearm other than Hanus, perhaps it would be geniuses such as the head researcher of Magos Le'Flamme, or the one regarded as the famous genius technomagi of Orvel.

The story behind the creation of this weapon is an interesting tale to tell.

In the past, when Hanus was achieving much with her feat, she was assigned to a smuggler elimination operation. During the mission, the ringleader of the smuggling connection insulted Hanus whilst escaping the scene: 'The children's playground is over there. You should go and play a war game with your friends instead.'
Enraged to the max, Hanus fought with everything she had, but Hanus had to retreat due to the sheer number of bodyguards protecting the ringleader.

Hanus was enraged for days over the fact that she had allowed the criminal who insulted her to escape right in front of her. Then, on the day of the follow-up operation to eliminate the smuggling connection, Hanus brought this strange gun to the mission.

On that very day, one shot from her gun concluded the elimination operation.
As she shot her gun, she said to herself: 'It's play time.'

Atermos was one of the kings who ruled the Kingdom of Sekireinel, known as the king of insight for his great wisdom. One day, he received a revelation from the heavens and gathered holy materials to handcraft a weapon.\nThe legend says that as this weapon was wielded by the king of insight, Tyrannicus has the ability to look through the mind of anyone who tries to wield it. If deemed unworthy, Tyrannicus will not even let them hold itself; rather, it will serve the unworthy their death.\nAfter the passing of Atermos, Tyrannicus was used as a decoration that shined upon the throne from its behind, symbolizing the competence and authority of the king that rules Sekireinel. Then, the day before Cain's enthronement, when Cain reached his hands out to Tyrannicus, it immediately became the sun that shines upon Cain, as if it was overjoyed to find its true master.

A rune that proves that one is an agent of Lua, the Goddess of Light. The Rune of Proxy is an artifact of the Church of Lua, and it's given to the knight who wields the Aea, the Sword of Light. The Rune of Proxy pushes enemies with the power of light and increases ATK and morale.

Feather from the Guardian of the Sun. Feather of an Angel who saved the people by fighting against the Demons in the past. He left his feather as proof of his promise to return once again if the world falls into chaos. An artifact of the Church of Lua that summons holy rays of the sun to blind the enemy.

A scroll written by a fire sorceress who was known as the Goddess of Fire. A scroll left by the greatest Fire Sorceress of Orvelia, Vesta, when she was in the Tower of Sage. It's very powerful, but it also requires a lot of mana. Cleo took the Scroll of Purgatory from the Tower of Sage, which was considered a forbidden scroll. Now she's using it to enhance her Fire Rain.

The mask that Roi destroyed when he left the Laughing Mask assassins. Assassins mercilessly aim for their enemy's vital points, and they wear masks to suppress their emotions when they eliminate their targets. Roi faces the split mask, and goes behind his enemies to kill them with his Blade Claws to protect his friends.

Mug of the Barbarian King who first settled down in the snowy mountains. When the first Barbarian King settled down in Windland, he swore to become the guardian of the snowy mountains and shared this mug with the holy beings of the mountains. The protect magic of the frost wolf imbued in the Barbarian Mug increases the ATK of Vortex and the effect of Freeze.

A hammer that the ancient Dwarven King received as a gift from the Earth Elemental. It was a gift that the King received for saving the Gnome Kingdom from the attacks of the evil Earth Dragon Azi Dahaka. Upon using Earth Incarnate, this ceremonial hammer, imbued with the blessing of the spirit of the earth, increases DEF with the power of the earth's spirit, and grants immunity to HP recovery and CC.

Gunpowder made with Lakrak's dangerous secret recipe. \nLakrak believed that simple explosions weren't effective enough in terms of battle strategy, so he added some formic acid and stinging nettle poison to add a stunning effect. \nIt requires an extremely accurate filtering process, and he uses it in secret to avoid abuse.

Feather from a thunderbird, guardian of rain and thunder. The high ranking shamans of the Skywind Tribe commune through the feathers of a thunderbird. Shamans use this feather accessory when using Swift Wind \nto become one with the thunderbird, increasing ATK and ATK Spd of all allies.

Epis's treasured item. When Epis first arrived in the human world, she really got into human culture and attended a masquerade. The dancing of a girl wearing red heels caught her eyes, and she made a deal with her in exchange for the those shoes. Epis wears her seductive heels and get carried away when inflicting pain on her enemies with her dance.

Arrowhead imbued with the blessing of the Goddess of Hunting and the Moon. An ancient artifact that is passed down to the best Elven hunter. It is said that the Goddess of Hunting and the Moon cared for the Elves who protected the holy forest, and she lent her power to them through the artifact. The silver arrow imbued with the power of the Goddess of the Moon has a mysterious power that allows the user to defeat his enemy and boost DMG.

Ashes of a grey messenger that announces the end. These are the ashes of the raven that flew into the Church of Lua right before the Republic of Gray collapsed a hundred years ago. Everyone ignored the ominous messenger, and only Priestess Maria cared for it until its last day. Even after its death, it has helped Maria expand her area of darkness by pouring its dark energy on her.

Cannonball engraved with the symbol of the Miruru Pirates. Miruru still vividly remembers her glorious past. Her fluttering flag emblazoned with a shark, and the sounds of explosions that were at her command. Those fond memories of enemy ships sinking in terror still remain within her. Miruru is using special cannonballs to attack enemies, while waiting for the glorious days to come back once again.

Proof of the unity between the Druids and the World Tree. The great sages of Elidora have always maintained a deep bond with the World Tree. The roots of the World Tree are proof of the deep bond with the Druids. They attack enemies with supernatural DMG whenever Druids shout the Wrath of the Forest to show nature's fury and hostility.

Rune of the Orvel Guardian Knights. A Gold Lion Rune that is given to knights when they first join the Guardian Knights, along with the vow that they will give their lives to protect the kingdom. \nThe rune from the Guardian Knights bolsters a knight's iron will and loyalty, increasing the effectiveness of the Guardian Shield.

An ornament that was used for the memorial ceremonies of deceased royalty in ancient times. Inside the green jewel, there's a crystallized tear of the mythical creature that leads people to death. It's used as a resting places to comfort the emptiness within souls.

Tear fragments of the beast Heltanios, who lived at the bottom of the Fountain of Life. It spews out pitch darkness, and those who see its eyes end up having their souls stolen by the powerful dark energy.\nThose who become the master of these eyes will obtain great power and insight. When Dimael was captured in Aegina and was at the brink of death, Maria embedded these eye fragments.

A honorable medal given to the fastest mercenary. It's said to be a keepsake from Hersz, the fastest warrior in the world. Wearing this medal will make the bearer's body feel lighter, and they'll be able to predict the opponent's movements.
Frozen blood of the winter spirit. Pavel found it deep inside the Ice Cave and made it into earrings. A harsh chill and severe pain can be felt from it, but it increases Pavel's mana to its limit.

A stone known to protect one's soul from being absorbed by evil. It only shines for a while at dawn, so it's hard to find. One day, when Demia was tired from battle, a comrade put this in her hands. Even though it's a comrade that she can't ever see again... Demia always takes this stone when going out to the battlefield. She does her best to uphold her vow to never let the sacrifices of her comrades be in vain.

A ritual offering of ancient religious people who worshipped the wind. It is a precious treasure among the Harpies, and it is said to be given to the most powerful Harpy warrior. The moment one wears this mask, they'll be able to freely use the wind. They can also attack at the speed of light.

A barrage that was requested to the legendary blacksmith of the empire. It contains gunpowder made from the sturdy egg of a pitta and the jaw bone of a dragon turtle. It was made small so that Rodina can use it easily, but it has the power to destroy anything.

A strange fragment that came from the Dimensional Rift. Inside the fragment, there's a flame that kills anything that is living. The energy from its dimension is condensed within it. It's absolutely needed to complete Maria's plan.

The rosary that holy priest Evelyn of the Church of Lua carried until her death. It's as if Lua's holy voice can be heard from the rosary, praying that the world won't collapse. The undeniable holy energy engulfs the body, and it maximizes Baudouin's power.

A flower of the Republic that can no longer be found. It is also known as the Flower of Boundaries that connects life and death, and it gets its nourishment from destruction. A painfully beautiful flower. If you gift it to someone, you will be able to share that person's last moment in a dream.

A ring that was given along with the title of Purple from the Tower of Sage. It is an artifact of witch Eucaletus, who lived in the Swamp of Wisdom. The power it displays depends on the owner's ability. For some, it could be a source of unlimited mana. It's perfect for Aisha, who uses powerful magic cannons.

Ancient sorcery codex. A codex written by respected sorcerers that contains the principle behind magic that uses all of life and creation. It's written in an unknown language, so only part of it can be decoded. If the ancient text system is discovered, it might be possible to use spells without any cost whatsoever.

A rose that will never wither, even if it's been picked. It's a flower that Fluss loves. It reminds Fluss about the duty of a knight, which is the basis for his strong will that allows him to be confident in battle.

A legendary snowfield flower that blossomed from the never melting land of Windland Snow Mountain. It is said that it makes the energy of its master's body flow clearly and beautifully. An item that makes Luna's pure energy shine even brighter.

A sample of the ancient scripture, the Book of Chaos, that was swept away. The Book of Chaos is a historic scripture that is passed down to the Priest of Water, and it has records of culture, magic, and various fields. It was sealed in the golden Shrine of Flow along with Laias, but most of the book disappeared while she was asleep. The remaining Papyrus of the Flow is a boosting spell of the Festival of the Flow.

Angel Arbiter Pilier's soul egg. Pilier was born from Lua's first flame, and is Arch's master. Pilier was the best Angel warrior and was the one to end the war against the Demons. But after using all of his power, he went back to being an Eye of Heaven, which is the soul egg form, and Arch is holding onto his master's soul.

Ancient vampire queen's blood. The more pure-blooded a vampire is, the stronger their mana blood. The greatest of them all is the ancient vampire queen's blood, and vampires who drink her blood will have unlimited life and mana. It is a highly addictive type of blood, so be careful when using it.

A required item for wizards who go through dimensions. The Dimensional Stone is a magic stone that is loved by those who go through dimensions, and it contains unlimited energy. However, the power that one can use from it depends on the individual's ability. Only high ranking wizards can use it effectively.

The top secret code of Babel, the secret society of magic engineering. Magic for normal people! The secret society of technomagi, Babel, is an anonymous society that dreams of making magic available to all. They have each provided a technomagical technique as a secret code, and they've only allowed the use of it to those who can decipher it. Annette deciphered a top secret code in 4 minutes and is using it in the annihilation process.

Rune of the greatest mercenaries, the Steel Wolves. A rune that symbolizes the mercenary Steel Wolves, who were called the demons of the battlefield. Mitra was called the Silver Wolf of the battlefield. Even after he's left the mercenaries, he carries it in remembrance of the battle against the naval officer of the empire.

The seal that Ricardo used for the pledge of the Holy Warrior. When first appointed as a Holy Warrior, knights leave their names on the certificate of oath with their seals. Ricardo made his seal with his affection for the Church of Lua. \nHe still carries it now, after all this time.

A dagger given to those who complete the first mission of the Laughing Mask. There's a rule that says that assassins should always carry the dagger that has traces of their target. \nThe silent dagger that assassins carry like an amulet consistently whispers to them about death.

A bond containing the mana of an unknown priest. Young Ezekiel used to go berserk frequently. If anyone insulted his mom, he would allow his boiling demon blood to take over. Once he return to his senses, he would stare at his wounded arm and his terrified mom. When he was older, Ezekiel was getting rid of demons when he got into an argument with a bigger priest of Lua. He went berserk, just like any other day. Ezekiel was alone when he came to, and he was taken aback by the bond on his cursed arm. When he tried to take it off, he found that the priest's magic couldn't be shaken off so easily. However, he stopped going berserk and losing his consciousness after that. He's gained greater control over his mana, so it's now one of his most treasured items.

A legendary gold flame necklace pendant. The legendary Gold King made this gold flame necklace pendant to get the attention of the Goddess of Love and Beauty. \nIts gold scent creates a Tempting Wave that makes anyone join their side and be loved by everyone.

Legacy of the fallen Republic of Gray. A treasure that a respected palace wizard of the Republic of Gray gave to the 1st Knight Theo, who received the Lightning Bolt Legios. \nThe Lightning Essence that has the energy of the Lightning Bolt maximizes the effect of Lightning Explosion.

A special potion that has the teachings of a master. The genius surgeon and expert on anatomy, Doctor Aldini, is Mediana's master. Doctor Aldini recognized her talent early on, and he taught her extraordinary medical knowledge that couldn't have been imagined in the Church of Lua. The unidentifiable potion that was made with her master's special recipe increases the effect of the Strengthening Potion.

Fur of the Red Fur chief hung in the shadow of the moon. It is said that the mythical creature, the Red Fur Chief, uses the shadow of the moon during full moon to go through dimensions and dance. The Red Fur Chief dances until the shadow of the moon disappears, and it is said that his tail sometimes gets stuck in the pathway. The fur of the colorful mythical creature gets stuck in the rift of time and space and stops time temporarily. Oddy uses the fur from the traces of the shadows of the moon to make a skein and uses it effectively for Time Distortion.

Crystallized form of great demon Curapis's soul, who has the power to get big. He was one of the first demons that Viska hunted in the Demon World, and it is said that it used its big body to dominate his enemies. But battle isn't all about strength, but using one's brain as well. The giant demon was defeated and eaten by a predator who used her brain. The power to get big became Viska's, and she can use it freely now.

The first magic tool made by a wizard of Purple. The first gift that Aisha gave. Aisha created this magic tool because she felt bad that Priscilla used up so much power when using Turbulent Dance. The Mana Stone of Gravity relieves the pressure from the body when using Turbulent Dance, and it increases its effect.

T-bone steak from which you can taste a dragon's sirloin and tenderloin at the same time. The taste is truly wonderful. The dragon's holy energy enters the body, and increases Yanne's battle stamina to the max.

A magical sword passed down through the God King's descendants. The name 'Oasis' comes from how it was used to serve the people in dire times.\nAfter the kingdom fell, its whereabouts was unknown to the world until Zafir saw it among Kumuro's art collections and bought it at an incredibly high price. \nWith the sword finally returning to the worthy descendant, Zafir was able to inherit his forefather's spirits, maximizing his potentials.

One of the legacies left by the fortune teller Lasiphil, a distant ancestor of Yuria.\nNow kept in the back of Yuria's traveling wagon, this strange mirror covered with blue energy shows fate rather than reflections.\nYuria has a rough understanding of what the mirror reveals, but even she cannot interpret it completely.

A night concert is held once every few evenings at the backroom of Aselerando, Rehartna’s atelier.
In reality, it is actually an information-gathering session for the Resistance.
The reason they are holding a concert rather than a party is because the sound of music covers the sound of Resistance members exchanging information. The concert itself also does not draw suspicion because it is held in a place of musical instruments.
Only long medleys, handpicked by Rehartna, are played at the concert to prevent conversations from being interrupted by pauses between the pieces.
Each medley plays on for quite a long time, and this has always helped the Resistance immensely.
The legendary coin that is said to have changed the course of the wheel of fortune, which was headed toward destruction. Ophelia believes that it was thrown by the spirit of luck, Vellekia.

Medicine made from boiling the powder of the seventieth rainbow and the tongue of the giant beast Kiselaton who can cross hell. It is full of brilliant colors. The moment one drinks it, it burns the insides, but it is said that whoever drinks it slowly dies in happiness.

The trumpet that is said to be blown by the leader of the Archangels when the catastrophe that will end the Material World arrives. It is said that once the guardians hear the sound of the trumpet, they wake up and come down to protect this land.

A precious pendant containing the picture of Crow's deceased wife and daughter. He's frequently stares at the picture while sucking on candy, looking extremely sad and yet calm. It's a pendant even more precious than his life, so you better not lay a finger on it. Even if you are a god, you will have to pay with your life.

Shamilla has been cursed to hold all the curses in the world inside her,
but could also be seen as a savior who binds all those curses.
Her death would mean that all the evil she holds within would go back out into the world.
This Jar of Curses that Shamilla made is used to retrieve the curses that Shamilla spat out.

When Lavril came into being, people thought of her as a scary ghost and spread rumors about her.
The Church of Lua called in the high priests nearby to take care of her.
The Saint of Blessings Lucias and the maverick Baudouin were among the ones that answered the call.

Upon hearing about Lavril, the two hurriedly tracked her down and confronted her.
As soon as they saw her, they realized that she was not an ordinary ghost, but an amalgamation of child ghosts.

It didn't take long before they knew she wasn't a threat.
However, the Church had spoken. Ghosts are to be exorcized, and as priests, they were supposed to cleanse her and guide her to where she belonged.

But Lucias had a different idea.
Lavril was a pure soul that did not deserve an exorcism, and he wanted to let her proceed to the next realm when the time comes, following the law of nature.

Lucias took out his handkerchief, wiped the tears off Lavril's face, and showed her the path to the light with the teachings of Lua.
This handkerchief reminds her of Lucias, the light that guides her when she is in trouble.

The candle known to have been on the table of the meeting hall where ancient warriors from different continents gathered to defeat supernatural beings.
Blazing on this old candle is a blue exorcising flame.
When the flame touches an evil being, it sucks the vitality out of the creature's body.
This is the first material Seria uses whenever she refines her sword.

A dark red lipstick made from the blood of those who died disgraceful deaths.
The ones who abandoned their dignity as humans and caved in to their insatiable desires failed to escape Erze's grasp.
They died while in a complete trance state, but perhaps they might still feel happy about being used by Erze.
Erze uses it to leave a mark on the neck of her prey after she has fed on them.

A kettle that Lilia's old cacti friends made for her on her birthday. \nThe kettle infinitely produces the cleanest and purest water there is. \nHowever, if too much water is used at once, it shuts its spout, which is a featured added by the Cacti to help Lilia stay in control of the water until she becomes more skilled at it.

A legendary Veil only given to the best dancer in the continent. \nPerforming a dance with it on can mesmerize those who are watching. \nLaudia used the veil to mesmerize enemies with her seductive dance and achieved everything she wanted.

Research materials about the stigmata of the Saint of Blessings.
Although Lucias has the memories of the saints, they did not know everything.
Lua's priests left this document after researching the secret behind the stigmata,
but it was impossible for them to bring everything to light.

A ring bestowed upon the Commander of the Velchia Magic Knights.\nIt represents the power and pride of the finest order of magic knights in the Empire.\nKnights also use the ring as a stamp while doing paper work.

Crafted with his own fang, this stake holds Neraxis's burning rage.\nWhen Neraxis attacks with the stake, the great energy, entangled with Neraxis's powers, swirls at the enemy at a terrifying speed.\nIt is powerful enough to penetrate all things, and rip off the limbs of those who come near it.

A celebratory flag that was made to praise the king when Orvelia was first founded. Whenever she sees the flag in the office, it angers her to think of the treacherous subjects who reduced her father to a scarecrow and the flatterers who ruined the country. This made Scarlet even more determined to restore Orvelia's days of glory and to establish a stronger throne.

Heart of Baikal, who is called a holy beast. He eats the elements of light and dark from the world, so his heart is full of thunder from the collision between the two elements. If someone unskilled were to touch it, he would be absorbed by its power. But Sonia, who is made up of the core of lightning, absorbed that power and obtained mana that is beyond imaginable.

A crown that is passed down to the king of Penteonia. A part of it had been broken by a previous tyrant, but it's been repaired. A new red gem called the Soul of the Sun has been embedded at the center of the crown. Its dignified form compels one to kneel before it in a show of respect.
A collection of beautiful matter that is sprayed in Sonia's crystal ball like stars. Mirianne collected it to pull a prank, but it's so powerful that it's being used as a tool for assassination.

A chaplet that was by Shea's head the day after she performed Lullaby to the Dreams in the forest. According to Schwanheite, it was a gift from the fairies of the forest for her beautiful music. It is said that items that went through the hands of fairies have the power to return a soul back to its purest form.

Kara's source of power and one of the greatest masterpieces of an ancient civilization that has been long forgotten.
It's the basic technology that Annette used to make the Rascal, 
but not even she has been able to figure out everything about this special technology.
A permanent engine that continuously creates unlimited magic power.

A magical mask made with the skull of Prektrek, the beast of spell. Since Nia disliked traditional masks which covered her entire face, the bone mask was modified into a helmet.
The main use of bone masks is to keep the tribe leaders' demonic eyes from going berserk. However, the mask wasn't significant to Nia because her demonic eyes, despite their enormous powers, were very stable.
It is what Nia uses to remember her father, who was called by the Blue Star when she succeeded the Demonic Eyes of Petrification. They say that she made her bone mask with a skull that closely resembled her father's bone mask.
A little bit of trivia: The beast Prektrek is known to be distantly related to Goblins...

A fishing rod for kids that Esker's childhood friend gave him as a present.
There was an annoying boy living in a town that Stardust would visit during annual tours.
The boy, Lucias, would read the boring bible to Esker and frighten him with stag beetles.
Esker hated him for always smiling like an idiot at first, but they soon became close friends.

When Stardust came to visit Lucias's town on another tour, the two exchanged a token of friendship, and this fishing rod was what Lucias gave Esker.
Since then, Esker had to go fishing with Lucias every time he would come to the town.

A harmonica that Cecilia likes to play in her free time.
It was a gift that Ricardo gave her on her 15th birthday.
He was worried that his granddaughter might forget to relax every once in a while on her journey to realize a just world.
After a long consideration, he gave Cecilia this small harmonica with her name engraved on it.
However, Cecilia never bothered to learn more than one song, not knowing about her grandfather's intentions.

The first makeshift weapon Kirze made when she escaped from the Demon lab. They were made in haste-
since this was her first time she resonated with the crimson arcane crystals-
just so that she can escape.
This pair of daggers are barely finished, crude and on the verge of breaking.

These daggers are the very weapons that saved her and the other children.
They hold important memory, so she carries them as keepsakes.

Pauldron that Chase wears on one shoulder. It is made up of special ores that are hard to find in the Orbis Continent. 
It's light but extremely sturdy and unbreakable. 
An item that Demia managed to get for Chase, since Scarlet was fond of him.
Demia didn't show it much, but she was intrigued by how Chase normally seemed so naive, and yet was so enthusiastic when it came to sparring. 
Demia watched him for a few days, and one day, patting his shoulder, she nonchalantly gave Chase the pauldron. She told him that fighting was important, but it was also important to take care of his own body.

A ceremonial dagger used by the Lizardmen of Lake Eretana.
It was used as a decoration, especially in festivals and coming of age ceremonies.
However, after the Empire's invasion,
it got customized as a weapon by imbuing it with magic.

A commemorative goblet only given to mighty and brave mercenaries in the Empire.
The wolf, the symbol of Empire, is engraved on it.
In recognition of the countless victories Bernheim earned for the Empire, the royal family gave him this exquisite goblet, one of only 5 in the world.
Rumor has it that the goblet has a spell that makes any drink poured into it restore stamina.

The last present from an anonymous supporter.
Glenwys became the first tournament winner with a commoner's background, but what she needed to pay to defend her position in the following Imperial Colosseum Tournaments was far above an ordinary commoner's income. Most of her participation fee would come from the donations of citizens, but the time eventually came when the cost got too expensive for her to carry on competing.
However, to her surprise, help came for her from an anonymous supporter every time she was desperate for it, enabling her to continue fighting.
On the day that she became the winner of 3 consecutive tournaments, the 'Ballas Ruby,' a jewel of a knight, was delivered to her, which became the last gesture of support she ever got from the nameless helper. Since then, this ruby became her charm of victory that she always carries with her, grateful, but curious about who the supporter might be.

During the days of the ancient civilization, someone stole the spells of the sages and gathered their power in a single crystal ball. It seems like it was part of a plan to become the greatest shaman at the time. But there are no historic records of this crystal ball, and it was found far away from the village, near Eden River. Different elemental spells are mixed up in one place, making it dangerous, so it's unknown how its powers will be released.

Wreath given to the strongest warrior of Orbis Continent. It's only given to the winner of the fighting tournament that happens every 4 years. Those who wear this wreath are said to be able to borrow the strength of the War God.

A seal given to the best guild manager of Orvel. All guild affairs can't be processed without this seal. The meticulous Veronica doesn't stamp a document unless it's perfect. An item that shows Veronica's professional spirit.

An heirloom of Loman's family, this special pendant is bestowed by the first King of Orvelia to Loman's family in honor of their service and loyalty to protect the Orvel Monarchy. Its true origin is unknown, but it is believed to be an accessory that has the spirit of the Guardian of Orbis Continent from an ancient civilization. The owners of this item have said the same thing. When they resolve to stake their lives to defend what is important to them, they invoke a mighty power like the waves of the sea. People now believe this blue gem invokes spirits, and it started to be called the Sea of Invocation. Loman received it as an heirloom from his father when he entered the castle, and he always keeps it with him.

- Here is your order, Juno's Special!\nNo one takes the banner in front her inn that says 'Excellent Taste! Quality Guaranteed!' seriously until they put the food in their mouths. There are very few words that do Juno's food justice. When she was asked what her secret was, she smiled and answered,\n- It's Juno's Special Seasoning!

A strange knuckle bought from Cassandra while she was visiting Orvelia.
Cassandra met Nicky at the Inn, cursing and complaining about her disobedient prisoners, and sold her this item.
According to Cassandra, the skulls on the knuckle are made from the bones of high wizards, and the one with red eyes has the ability to cause hallucinations and endlessly torture enemies.
Nicky is using it, along with her mace, to punish felons.

An ornament that Dosarta made to play with Wind Elementals while guarding the Tower of Challenge all alone.
She ground the Mana stones that the elementals like, added the powder into the metal treated with Elven magic, and infused it with Rune Magic. Maybe the effort put into this plaything was a little bit too much.
It restores the natural powers of elementals.
However, rumor has it that Dosarta was downhearted when the Elementals came and did nothing but sit around near it without doing anything fun with its maker.

Hanus' favorite limited edition doll.
This doll, crafted by an Orvelian doll workshop with a deep historical background, is made after a mythical creature unseen in this world.
This doll is extremely popular among children, but the extra-limited edition belongs to Hanus only.

Everyday, Hanus changes the doll's highest-quality clothes, and equips the doll with her handcrafted toy gun. As it got fitted with more things, it started resembeling Hanus that people began calling the doll Mini Hanus.
Some people asked Hanus if the doll has a name, but Hanus refuses to tell them, saying that she is the only one who gets to call the doll by its name.

A sealed container which cannot be opened no matter how hard one exerts strength.
It contains a gift from Shakmeh, Cain’s brother who left behind his settled life in a foreign nation and returned to Sekireinel following Cain's command.
Cain had cherished his loyal, kind brother's gift, but the day when Shakmeh became the darkness that covered Sekireinel and became Cain's nemesis, Cain used his brother’s gift as a medium to seal Shakmeh.
Cain, after awakening from his long slumber, grabbed the open container that was rolling on the ground and placed it somewhere he can see clearly to reflect upon old memories.

Gauntlet imbued with the blessing of Lua, the Goddess of Light.\nGauntlet passed down to the kings of the Orbis Continent. Contains the encouragement of the goddess that allows you to use Valiant Dash towards enemies without any fear.

Medal made by the saintess of miracles, Yvonne, with the revelation of the goddess. \nThe Medal of Miracles is a sacred artifact that contains the magic of light. It is said that saintess Yvonne saved the city that was invaded by the demons with the blessing of light that was boosted with this medal.

An elixir that fire alchemist Flamel created by condensing flame essence.\nFlamel's flames continue to burn and burn. Every wizard praises him for his flames, and the flame essence that he made with the salamanders from the Dragia Volcano maximizes the effect of Fire Ball.

A dangerous hood made with the secret method of the Laughing Mask. \nIt was made with the legendary soma that is said to provide endless vitality and the secret of the Laughing Mask. \nSoma's hood increases the morale of an assassin inside the dark curtain, increasing their ATK, and granting dexterity, maximizing P. Dodge.

Trumpet made with the horn of the guardian beast of Windland Snow Mountain, Orox.\nOrox of the Snowy Mountain grants noble warriors great power and the ability to see the truth. \nWhen a warrior who has received the blessing of Orox blows this horn, it will boost the morale of comrades and bring clarity to their minds.

Ancient Dwarf King's capricorn helmet. \nIt is made from the gold of dragons that was obtained after defeating the greedy dark dragon Bokrug. The magnificent golden horn of the helmet is imbued with the dark dragon's magic that will slow down an enemy who is hit with Headbutt.

A high-performing mask that was made with special materials that Lakrak obtained from around the Orbis Continent. \nThis mask is made from Harpy's first feather, a dragon's scales, a leaf from the World Tree, and the empire's mithril, which are all hard to find. \nThis mask protects one from poisonous gas as well as the blinding effect of Smoke Bombs.

Mask of the auspicious thunderbird that brings rain. \nOnce the Healing Droplets of the Skywind shaman begin, the soul of the thunderbird stays by those who were hit by Healing Rain and recovers their tired bodies.

Box containing the Nightmare Queen's sand of sleep. \nA box from the Demon World that contains magic sand that causes one to fall asleep. \nWhen the enemy falls asleep, attacks the enemy and deals M. DMG through a nightmare that cannot be dispelled.

A stone in which a reckless wind bow elemental is sealed. \nThe elemental caused all kinds of trouble with its evil tricks, so it was sealed by the Fairy King. \nThe belligerent wind elemental infuses arrows with destructive wind, increasing its killing power by 5 times or more.

A claw armor that Maria gifted to Lea's messenger. \nThe claw armor that is made with fancy gold contains a binding curse that never lets go of any enemy that it grabs. Enemies bound by the messenger's Sabaton will become defenseless against magic attacks and will receive great damage.

Sextant of Pirate King Olga, who was the first to discover the new continent. \nPirate King Olga went past the Orbis Continent to find a new continent, following a revelation from the gods. The sextant can calculate the most accurate location and angle in the world. Miruru uses the sextant to boost the damage from rolling bomb attacks, but she doesn't remember how she ended up with it.

The beautiful but poisonous Belladonna.\nIt's a dangerous plant that only the Great Sage can handle. The little Belladonna that is mixed up with vines poisons enemies and makes them defenseless against magic attacks.

Old wooden shield of the knight of the Iron Wall. \nIt's a precious shield that Clause used when he first started training. He has since engraved the names of his deceased comrades in order to remember his determination as a guardian knight. \nEach time he pushes away enemies with the shield, the knight's firm determination helps him tap into power beyond his limits.

A collection of the energy that is created when a life is born. It's very warm and gentle, so souls like it. Rephy uses it to start a fire in a lamp to borrow the power of the souls. When a seed is put in a lamp, it shines brightly, like when the sun was first born.

A bracelet that was shared with Epigael a long time ago. It has shadow morion hanging, which is a precious jewel amongst the Dark Elves. \nIt is said that those who cut off the shadow morion and will have a thread of their souls, which will lead them to meet again in the next life.

The ring that Reina received after defeating her master. It's too big, so she wears it on her thumb. \nIt looks simple and ungainly, but the spirit of fighting is hidden within the rune letters engraved in the ring.\nStaring at the ring of her master makes her feel like she will be getting more work today.

The dragon of ice gifted this brooch to a young Pavel, and imbued it with its breath.\nBut after the dragon of ice and Pavel became one, it reminds Pavel to not leave him. It can inflict pain that pierces the heart. \nImbues a chill to Pavel's mana, making his magic even sharper.

A wooden shield that Demia used as a child for practice. It's been used over a thousand times and is very worn out. \nDemia uses it to regain her composure when she feels like she has hit a limit.\nHer pride as a knight of Orvelia resurfaces when she sees this old, worn-out shield.

The scarf that the dead Himmullis had on. Naila always has it on her.\nHimmullis use to always tell Naila to be proud of being a Harpy. \nThe scarf contains the sadness of losing family, and this makes Naila furious.
A sniper rifle support that Pavel made so that it would fit Rodina's small body.\nIt's made of crystals so it's very firm and sturdy. This support is enough to aim at any target.

Gloves made with a dark Hatchling's bones and skin. 
Morrah made it a hundred years ago by collecting the Hatchlings she killed when she went out to hunt dragons. 
It's very durable to even withstand Morrah's flames, and even imbues a stronger power to let those flames blaze up even more.
Morrah really likes these gloves.
The last chapter of the legend that was too horrifying and terrifying to put in the Bible. \nIt talks about the holy light that kills the darkest enemy in the world.
The cushion that Jane hugs to sleep inside the coffin. It's imbued with the spirits that fell asleep with her inside the coffin. \nThey constantly give the hollowness of death to Jane.

A sacred treasure passed down through generations of the von Daphnel family. It was a shaman tool to save mana in ancient times. \nAfter Aisha embedded the Noble Purple gem with her mana, its power came out. Now it shines brilliantly.

Ink made by extracting young leaves from the World Tree. Only 10 droplets can be produced in a year.\nThe magic spells written with this ink grant great vitality to the body.\nIt's very precious and hard to obtain, so Leo doesn't use it unless it's for a special occasion.
Perfume containing the first Vivienne roses of the year. Vivienne roses are beautiful but deadly.\nThose affected by the smell will hallucinate and just stare in awe as their opponent moves.
A carrot that grew from receiving moonlight a thousand times. \nThose hit by this carrot will have all evil stripped away from them, and they'll be able to tell apart good from bad.

Water essence that the Blue Dragons protect. \nThe essence of an oasis that the Blue Dragons brought to the desert at the beginning of the world. Protecting and defending this is the sacred mission of the Priestess of Water Laias, and it is her favorite thing to do. The Oasis Crystal leads the Priestess of Water who uses the Bubble Shield to the person who most needs her help.
The symbol of Fire Arbiter Army that fought a fierce battle against Ancient Demons. \nWhen using the Magic Square of Pursuit blessed by Lua, the Goddess of Light, Arch becomes a merciless arbiter.

Magic tool of the successor of blood.
The spells of the pure Vampire Lord's family have been passed down through generations. 
The successor of Lewisia is Vampire Sir Lusben, and the Spell of Bloody Mist is a gift from him. 
Lewisia hates anything that has to do with being a successor, but she likes how the Blood Zone reduces her fatigue, so she enjoys using it.

A legendary sword that has transcended eras.\nA legendary sword that was made with the light of the sun and the melted souls of those in pain.\nIt is one of the required items for Dimension Cleaver since it is durable enough to withstand dimension and can be made very sharp.

A healing script for emergencies.\nIt's a product of the secret society of magic engineering, Babel's workshop for the month, 'Battles are Self-serve! Winning scripts in Mechanic Script Battles.' \nCreated by Annette, it's a skill that can heal allies just through engineering, without borrowing any healing magic powers.

Steel Wolf's special barrage box. \nThe Steel Wolves were infamous for being too violent and making it impossible to revitalize their enemies. \nThe most infamous Silver Wolf only uses the maximized Wolf Barrage Box that he got from the owner of the Gold Bar.

Shield of the arbiter of Lua's Holy Knights. \nArtifact given to those who've earned the title of Arbiter from the Lua's Holy Knights. \nAn artifact imbued with Goddess Lua's blessing, it protects those under the benevolence of the god, and punishes enemies without mercy.

A multi-purpose tool of Laughing Masks used for assassination. \nIt is a unique item for Laughing Masks, known for their speed and efficiency in eliminating their targets. \nOptimized to the wearer's attacking patterns, it improves the handling of throwing weapons and enhances continuous attacks while casting Blade Tornado.
