Choker made with the skin of a powerful beast.\nLoot that celebrates the manticore that Ezekiel hunted after a hard battle against the Demons when he was young. \nEzekiel remembers the joy of killing the manticore every time he touches the violent beast's choker, just before he charges at the formidable enemy in front of him.

A luxurious accessory made by the greatest jeweler in the continent.
A limited edition ornament created by jeweler Larik. Any person in high society on the Orbis Continent would love to have one. 
His work is said to be the epitome of art, and it is said to heal and grant courage. 
There are only 3 of the limited edition Fancy Ornaments, and one of them obviously belongs to the master of the Gold Bar.

Called a thunderbolt from the sky. Legios is also called a holy beast. 
The power of Legios was so strong that when they made it into a weapon, the Republic of Gray couldn't contain all of its power. 
So the greatest piece was put in the Spear of Lightning, and the remaining pieces were put into different places. 
One of those pieces was put into God of Lightning's Necklace. It is said that anyone with this necklace can commune with the Spear of Lightning and get closer to the power of Legios.

A special potion that has two type of effects.\nMediana wondered if there was a way to handle attack and recovery at once. She went to the library and read a dusty book called 'Slimes Can Also Make Cannons.' \nMediana was reading just for fun, but found a way to apply the principle of cannons into her piston. She was then able to invent the Special Potion of Double Reaction and maximize recovery and attack when using Special Water Cannon. Mediana is still thankful to the author of the book who gave her the inspiration.

Time Fragments that fell from the shadows of the moon.\nSometimes, Time Fragments fall from another dimension from the effect of the shadow of the moon that appears when using time magic. \nThe Time Fragments are small, but when gathered, they become a giant Fragment Collection of records, which give ceaseless inspiration to the caster.

Claw of the violent magic beast Urgol, who is said to bite off souls.
The day Viska decided to hunt in the Material World, she devoured Urgol from the Demon World.
Combined with the ability that Viska has to absorb the power of others, it displayed great power,
and it is essential to eat Demons who trespassed to the Material World.

Aisha's favorite ceramic tea cups that Priscilla has ready at all times. \nLuxurious tea cups made from the best clay of the eastern continent across the sea. It's mostly used for tea time with Aisha, but it is also used when using Coordination with Priscilla.

An arrow made from Mad Dragon Svelta's spine, who spews out powerful magic cannons. It's Yanne's loot. The arrowhead has the Mad Dragon's burning red eye. It's still imbued with its madness, always ready to burn the enemy.

An hourglass that was buried underground for a long time by an enormous sandstorm that struck Aegina Desert.
When the sand in the hourglass moves, it calls for the mirage of an ancient city coming back to life.
The high priest of the ancient kingdom used this to show the glory of the kingdom to its people in the past.
Seeing their city shining in gold, people grew proud of their kingdom.

One of the legacies left by the fortune teller Lasiphil, a distant ancestor of Yuria.
It's a set of 3 rings that have never lost their luster, even after the passage of time.
They contain special powers that even Yuria cannot gauge.
One of the books that Yuria's grandparents left said that when the time comes, the Foreseeing Eyes will shine their light, and that it will guide the prophet onto the right path.

The core component of Matimaruma.
It replaces the sound-generating component of Matimaruma to transform it into a weapon.
Since the effect of each ultrasonic wave is different, Rehartna gave a different color to each of them to tell them apart.
Back when Rehartna was busy making Matimaruma, she crafted all other parts with ease, but she could not craft the most essential part the way she wanted to.
Worried about Rehartna stressing over the solution, her comrades helped her out by collecting every resource they could find through research.
They did not forget to place a note between a book, which said: ‘You don’t have to do everything by yourself. It’s okay to ask for help.’
Upon reading the note, Rehartna felt a surge of energy from within and managed to finish crafting the ultrasonic wave generators.
The part was made by utilizing the arts of technomagic, and the colors of each wave are Rehartna’s tribute to her comrades.

Spirit of love, Elliciad's heart. \nIt eats both fulfilled and unfulfilled loves, so it can sometimes be as hot as lava, or as cold as ice. The power it displays depends on how contaminated a soul is, and it can display an extensive light of blessing to those with pure souls.

A nasty fang of a Basilisk that only absorbs evil energy. Its poison is actually strong enough to melt souls. If the poison from the fang is mixed up with screechy grass, it could become a tremendous drug that no organism could survive. Requina's heart is beating hard with anticipation.

Bracelet made by the Archangels to protect the Angels when they descend down to earth. It contains the sun, so it shines brilliantly.\nWhen the angels feel fear, it is said that the sunlight from the bracelet protects their souls. \nAnd the fates of the angels are intertwined in the bracelet, so when they feel like their lives are threatened, they can feel each other's pain instinctively.

Magos Le'Flamme, the imperial weapons development organization, succeeded in enhancing the Ground Chill Missile. They tried to equip it on the new weapon Akistra to test it out. However, Crow stole Akistra, so the missile that was equipped on it was stolen as well. This missile contains a powerful chill, and it's enough to freeze the surrounding land.

A strange jewel from which the resentful whispers of ancient demons can be heard.
A cursed item filled with the souls of long forgotten ancient demons.
They wish to escape every day, but she won't let them out that easily.
Her soul has accepted all the curses of the world,
so it is as deep and dark as the abyss.

On one sunny day, Lavril was wandering around a village timidly, wanting to make some friends.
She wanted to go inside the village and make some friends, but the recent memory of being driven away by the priests of Lua kept her from doing so.

Just then, she heard a joyful singing near the flowerbeds just outside the village.
Curious, she slowly moved toward where the voice was coming from.
A girl was singing and playing the harp among the full-blown flowers, and the children, animals, even fairies were dancing to her song.

Mesmerized by the scene, she was walking toward the flowerbeds before she knew it.
The moment she set her foot in the flowerbeds, fairies and animals started to shriek and hide, and children burst into tears.
They were very sensitive to energy, and they felt threatened by Lavril's presence.

The girl, however, reacted in a completely different way.
She calmed the creatures down, picked a few flowers around her, and handed them to Lavril.

Holding the flowers, Lavril gave a blissful smile out of the feeling of acceptance.
Then, animals, fairies, and children all started to greet her merrily, having realized Lavril would not harm them.

A silver ring that represents the ShadowHilts. Seria touches it whenever she feels her life is meaningless.\nDoing so would remind her of her dead comrades, filling her heart with the need for vengeance against her sister Erze.\nIronically, the ring has a note written by Erze, hidden within the ring's jewel when she was young, but Seria still doesn't know about it.

A wine made by Erze herself with the blood of fallen priests.\nOne of her greatest pleasures is forcing those once considered holy to kneel before her.\nInside the bottle is a bloody cross, and those who hear Erze drinking the wine off it shiver and tremble as the sound of the cross clanging inside.
A gold necklace for girls that Laias crafted for Lilia with a Gem of Protection. \nIt gleams with the energy of water elementals in it. \nIt is a symbol of Laias's care for her little sister.

A chest containing the artifacts needed for worship rituals for the Dragon of Water. \nSome ornaments on it are crafted with 'Azure Lapis Lazuli,' a gem that represents complete fullness. \nIt is the dearest thing that Laudia's father treasures, and is only given to those who have the ability to lead the entire Trovatia tribe.

Lucias had a cherished friend back when he was young.
This friend was a member of a troupe named Stardust. He had very nimble hands despite his young age
and used to pickpocket countless wallets from gamblers.
However, Stardust would only visit Lucias's town once a year,
and so the two friends gave each other something they treasured to remember their friendship.
This dice is the special trick dice made by Lucias's friend, Esker.

The inquisitor's plaque that the Emperor bestowed upon Chrisha.\nThe silver wolf and the sword in its mouth symbolize authority and control,\nwith which Chrisha could enact justice and chastise evil on behalf of the Emperor.

A hair accessory that Laias dropped while cleansing the waters corrupted by demons.\nNeraxis found it and kept it, but he still hasn't decided whether he'll give it back.\nIt's not likely that Laias will get her lost hair accessory any time soon.

Pendant made by Scarlet, whose principles won't let her ignore injustice or kneel in the face of cowardice. She gifted one each to the people she relies on: Clause and Demia. \nThe shining wings of the royal emerald, which symbolize justice, are embedded inside the pendant. One can straighten oneself out by staring at the pendant that reflects one's eyes.\nShe looks at it each time she feels despair by looking at the people who lay blame on her father Veroglance II.

A cloak that Mirianne made for Sonia by braving a danger. There was a time when Sonia's clothes would burn from the explosion of the electricity that ran through her body. Mirianne saw that and plucked out the ereth plant that is said to grow by being struck by lightning. She pulled out its thread and completed a cloak with it. Sonia saw Mirianne's blistered hands from the electricity, and she cried in silence for a long time. A piece of clothing just for Sonia that can't be found anywhere else.

Earrings made from light kveril, a rare mineral that is said to only come out in Penteonia. When Artemia was crowned Empress, she received it along with the crown. It doesn't lose its light even at night, and it actually shines even more brightly in the dark. It's known as the jewel of principles and brilliance amongst the people. \nAn item that raises the dignity of the queen as they shine from her ears.

Ring that Mirianne purchased at the 'Amazing Magic Toy Shop' in Orvel. She engraved Sonia's and her name in the ring. The two make a set, and it allows each other to teleport to the location of the other once a day. Though, Sonia doesn't use it since it's troublesome...\nIt may be a toy, but Mirianne is happy that there's one more way for her to protect Sonia.

A flower that was by Shea's head the day after she performed Happiness from the Wind.\nAccording to Schwanheite, it was also a gift from the fairies of the forest for her beautiful music. \nIt contains Shea's wish that the wind will carry happiness all over the world.

A recording device and processor that works as Kara's brain.\nIt's a treasure that is filled with ancient wisdom, and its capacity far surpasses that of humans.\nDespite being such an incredible device, it has a hard time recording and replicating emotions.

The fame of Dragon Slayer Yanne spread not only to the Orbis Continent, but also to the Vespia empire. Yanne, a skilled monster hunter, was requested by a noble in the empire to hunt down the monsters inhabiting the Jungle of Darkness. However, the empire's ulterior motive was to drive away the natives so that they could develop the jungle and use it for their own sake. Without knowing the truth, Yanne walked into the jungle. The Krakashu tribe, led by the young leader, Nia, mistook Yanne as an imperial invader and attacked her. After Yanne subdued the tribespeople rather effortlessly with her superhuman strength, she had a talk with Nia and figured out the truths. She apologized to Nia for entering their land without permission, and gave her the necklace she made herself as a sign of reconciliation and friendship.

A chess piece that belonged to Esker's performance partner in Stardust.
When the magic show was over, the duo would play chess and talk about their performance earlier. 
The day that the 'incident' happened and Esker decided to leave the troupe, no one but his partner knew what he had in mind.
Handing this chess piece in Esker's hands, he told Esker not to forget Stardust and to come back when he could.

Balls that Cecilia used to kick around.
Especially, the soccer ball helped her improve her kicking skills.
She was always the leader of the kids in the neighborhood, and she always kept the balls close to her as a memento of her carefree childhood.
She takes them out whenever she feels a little depressed or frustrated.

Kirze adores dolls ever since she was a child, but all she had were rag dolls her mother made for her since her family did not have good living.
While living with her mother, Kirze was able to learn some tips and tricks for sewing and doll making.

After all this time, she still loves dolls, but now she makes them not only for herself but for others as well.
Especially for children who lost their loved ones at the hands of rouge Demons.

An item given to Chase by Scarlet. She gave it to him because she felt sorry for him for not having a name.
Chase's name is embroidered in one corner of the handkerchief. 
It doesn't really match his look, but he carries it all the time. 
Chase lost his memory and could only figure out who he was by the test subject code marked on his waist. The moment when someone called him by a name was when he finally found a goal in life. 
He decided to use his overflowing power to protect those who made him feel alive.

A trinket Dakaris received from his parents.
This bracelet is made with intertwined gold and silver bracelets.
It is a traditional wedding bracelet that symbolizes everlasting bond.
Dakaris has this bracelet as a memento of his parents.

A medal of light bestowed upon him when he was conferred knighthood in Penteonia.\nHaving the sun engraved on it, this gold medal assures the bearer that the light is always with him.\nAlthough Bernheim was deprived of his knighthood and was banished from the country, his loyalty always lies with the proud Penteonian Knights.

The Annual Imperial Colosseum Tournament was where all the courageous fighter could compete to prove their worth, regardless of their origins and social ranks, but the winner was always a well-equipped nobleman, knight, or soldier sponsored by noble families. Everyone knew it was no longer fair, but no one would dare say it out loud.
However, Glenwys, a 16-year-old commoner girl who had no strings to pull, won the tournament 4 years ago and the noble purpose of the competition was regained. On the day of her victory, the Colosseum was filled with thundering applause of the audience who were longing to see haughty aristocrats lose what they thought belonged to them. Glenwys became a new idol of the Empire, and people were buying gifts for her.
Glenwys, however, had to turn down all the gifts. Not only was the national attention too much for her, but she also knew that those with power would never take joy in seeing commoners rally around a hero like her.
Nevertheless, she could not say no to a timid little girl that came holding a paperweight made of dandelions in her small hands, and it became the only present that she kept for herself.
Special cake made by Juno. Its smells very sweet. \nMay loves it as a snack. No one knows why she doesn't tell anyone what she put in it.

Silvervine is used to exponentially boost physical ability. \nNothing else, but this silvervine. Others may try chewing silvervine, drink it, boil it, but it won't work.\nGladi just needs this silvervine to have the effect of the War God.

Pen point that Veronica always carries around. She had soaked it in the Spring of Promise for 100 days, just like Blacksmith Jin had advised. With the power of magic, the letters written by this pen turn red when the actions are not carried out accordingly. Veronica says it's very helpful when managing supplies.

Loman used to carve small sculptures as big as his hand while sorting out his thoughts when things went wrong. As he smoothed out their edges, he'd feel at peace, recalling how he was when he was just learning the basics. It was just a pastime at first, but soon it became his hobby, a passion that filled his room with hundreds of sculptures. And one day, Loman started to make wooden dolls to give to his friends and his men. Back then, sorcerous dolls known to protect hearts from evil were popular in Orvelia. Loman asked an old shaman who practiced ancient folk remedies to enchant his wooden dolls with a spell of protection, and he gave them to his colleagues.

A jar that Juno in her naive days bought at a rip-off price from a suspicious merchant. The merchant told her that the jar was able to turn plain water into magical broth. He managed to demonstrate the process with his nimble hands, and successfully made her fall for it.\nWhat he didn't know, however, was that the Jar would actually become a true Jar of Happiness through Juno's amazing culinary skills. With greatly improved Juno's culinary skills and the addition of Juno's Special Seasoning, an improved version of the magical broth powder that the merchant used, the jar is now one of the most important kitchen tools in Juno's inn, producing top-notch dishes.

A pendant acquired from a fight with the Gladi, Nicky's lifelong rival.
It is known that in the past, the War God of Orbis Continent imbued his power into the pendant so that it could be used for possible future crisis.
Inside the jewel is a flame, blazing like the soul of a fighter.
When it came to the auction house, Gladi and Nicky fought days and nights for it, neither having the upper hand. 
Was what happened next an act of mischief by the Goddess? When the fight grew particularly fierce, the wind delivered the scent of silver vine. Gladi, lured by the sweet scent, gave up the fight and ran outside.
Eventually, Nicky won the pendant.

An ancient crystal orb passed down in the royal family of Elidora.
It's a magical tool made with Artifact Pieces by the royal Elves running the Tower of Challenge.
It is said that the owner of this crystal orb can talk to anyone in the world remotely, wherever they are.
To respond to any contingencies in the Tower of Challenge, the royal family made it a rule that only the manager of the Tower of Challenge can keep it in possession.
Despite its strategic and historical importance, the crystal is nothing but a means of communication to Dosarta that she uses to have casual conversations with her big sister, Selene.

The first firearm that Hanus modified in her earlier days. It is then when Hanus' ingenuity first surfaced.
While playing with blades and firearms, she remembered her father's big gun which was kept inside her father's room.
Hanus' father once told her that despite its great firepower, the gun was ultimately deemed unsuitable for combat due to its massive weight.
When Hanus saw the gun however, she felt that the gun could be modified appropriately. After contemplating for some time, she sneaked the gun from her father's room.
After a few days, the gun was successfully modified into a tiny gun that fits Hanus.

Hanus' father scolded her harshly for touching his gun without permission, but he could not hide his surprise when he saw the modified gun.
Even though the gun's weight had been dramatically decreased, its firepower remained the same. After seeing this insane weapon, Hanus' father felt that her daughter's craftmanship is something extraordinary.

Even more amazing is the fact that all this took place when Hanus was just 5 years old.

A coffin with an eye decoration, the symbol of the God King.\nThe symbol carries a message that since the almighty God King watches all over the ancient Sekireinel, the people of the desert should fear and praise him.

The crown of Kyle, the king of Orvelia and the Hero of Holy Sword.\nWorn by King Kyle during his expedition to kill Dark Lord Angmund 100 years ago, this golden grown contains the will of the Goddess of Light. After Angmund was defeated, the Crown of Light, along with the Holy Sword, Aea, was left in the place where the king disappeared.

The treasure that Frey loves dearly.\nIt is a crystal orb that Frey had when she was found as an infant under the World Tree. Frey named it Angel's Egg for its luster like angel's hair, and she's cherished it her entire life.

A magical lantern from the Tower of Sage.\nThe ever-burning phoenix, the Tower of Sage's first flame, is sealed inside it. Dominix looked after it with great care as phoenixes are now endangered, but Cleo nonchalantly uses it to enhance her Fire Needle spell without taking her teacher's concerns into consideration.

A bagh nakh in the shape of a beast's claw.\nIt's a concealed weapon made with a Damascus blade, used by the assassins from the east, to maximize the effect of Shadow Blade. Forged with heat and blood, Shadow Blade is known as a cursed weapon lusting for blood. Most people, with the exception of skilled assassins, keep away from it.

A worn-out helmet of Frost Giant King.\nIt was last used by the darkness-ridden Frost Giant King. Gau, hoping that the tragedy of Windland Snow Mountain won't repeat itself, keeps this broken helmet to mourn the fallen hero.

A golden shield decoration that has the image of a Mad Dragon engraved on it.\nDwarf master artisans gave it to King Phillop as a present for his remarkable work in hunting Mad Dragons. Phillop did not put it on his shield as it was a little too fancy to use in combat, but he always carries it as a charm to show his gratitude to the warm-hearted artisans.

A self-defense bullet with lower killing power.\nThis bullet, whose design is based on Lakrak's knowledge in precise explosive engineering, is used to cause knock-back when using Rapid Fire. To minimize unnecessary killing, he makes it a point to label all his explosives.

A bracelet made from a holy thunderstone.\nAlso known as Thunder God's Tear, the thunderstone on the bracelet maximizes the power of Thunderbolt. It's passed down through generations among the orc shamans.

Epis's favorite liquor.\nThe most notorious liquor in Orvel, it is made from the strongest wormwood and can cause people to hallucinate. It is secretly used by artists to stoke their inspiration or as a cure for bad cases of insomnia. For Epis, however, it's a light, easy drink.

Gloves blessed by a Wind Elemental.\nDosarta gave the gloves to her sister, Selene, as a present in gratitude for her hard work in protecting the peace of Elves. They were made with cloth imbued with the magic of a Wind Elemental, Sylphid, on which Dosarta added some embroidery with moonlight thread.

A magic mirror that summons Tempest Elemental Aerial.\nThis magical mirror is made with an obsidian stone from Pandemonium, and Tempest Elemental Aerial sleeps inside it. Whenever Raven Storm is used, Aerial awakes and amplifies its effect with its violent dance.

Miruru's lucky coin is an ancient treasure of the sunken kingdom.\nIt is a trophy from her first treasure expedition after her form was changed into that of a kid. The coin, crafted via ancient metallurgy, was kept in Miruru's breast pocket, and it's now her precious lucky charm after saving her life several times.

The Book containing knowledge about all life in the forest.\nA magical book passed down among the guardians of the World Tree since ancient times. After being in the hands of Elidoran sages for a long time, Lorraine now has it in safekeeping.

A ceremonial cape used on special occasions of Orvelia.\nEver since it was bestowed upon Clause on the day he was knighted, it reminds Clause of his early resolutions. Whenever he wants to quit, exhausted from all the battles, Clause would bring it out and contemplate on it. Young Kasel used to watch Clause do this and dream of becoming a knight.

A small music box containing the voice of Asiphia, Queen of Blue star. Rephy opens it when guiding souls.\nThe souls heading to the Garden of Rest receive the grace of the Blue Star by listening to the song of Asiphia recorded in the box.\nWhen Asiphia's voice flows, twinkling like starlight, nothing dark or corrupt can come near those souls.

One of the daggers that Dimael shared with his comrades dispatched in Aegina.
When the Black Moon rose in the desert sky, he gave them these daggers and they all vowed to face their destiny.
They supported each other and tended to each other's wounds while fighting the evil creatures storming out from the rift.
However, he was the only one who returned alive from Aegina.

A pair of mystical Ear Cuffs that raise the wearer's speed to the limit.\nNyx gave it as a present to Reina, who kept telling him to open portals since she didn't care for the rigors of traveling. Reina wears this strange item in battle, and she looks like a pretty butterfly flying at lightning speed when she raises her sword.

A snow crystal in an ancient form, and a home of the winter elementals.\nIts beauty imprisons weak minds in an eternal blizzard. Dragons Andarta and Andraste gave this to Pavel after he made their wish come true. It also consoled his lonely heart during his solitary stay in Windland until Rodina came along.

An old Chest passed down among the Ziltrion family as an heirloom.\nA photo album of all the family members, from the first to the current generation, is safeguarded by a strong spell inside this chest to protect the family's bloodline. Demia's mother is worried about her daughter, who decided to be the shield of Orvelia. Whenever Demia marches to the battlefield, she prays to this chest for her daughter's safe return.

This piece of amber containing a giant tornado is a treasure of the Harpies.\nAccording to myth, a gust of wind that Divine Beast Tyrfas raised out of rage hit the sap of the holy tree, solidified, and turned into amber. Time passed, and now it's divided into several fragments, but the gust inside has not died out. Harpies consider it to be divine and call it the Soul of Gust.

A special shoulder guard that Fluss struggled to get for petite Rodina.\nIt is very hard and sturdy as it was made with Black Larva leather. It is one of Rodina's favorite items since it has great recoil absorption.

The last eye of Belzebuna, a beast that feeds on the lava of hell.\nThe eye, the only one left out of 100, blazes with dark lunacy.\nThe beast smelt a sealing stone from Morrah, lost control, emerged from the lava, and dashed directly to her. Morrah, however, did not hesitate to stab its eyes with Carprain, and a completely different type of heat shriveled Belzebuna and absorbed its body. Looking at its entire body being crushed and the last eye wriggling on the ground, Morrah stuck it on her shield to mock the beast.

A wooden grail that has Goddess Lua's face engraved on it.\nWhen the people first learned of Lua's existence, they made a grail for her in praise of her divinity. As the civilization in Orbis Continent fell, the grail was also buried underground, and it's only been mentioned in records. However, on the day that Baudouin repented his sins and realized the truth of the holy book, this old grail appeared in front of him, shining like the sun.

A doll used in funeral ceremonies in the Republic of Gray.\n It is normally made to look like the deceased and put in front of the tombstone. After the republic fell and Jane died, people put this doll beside her body.

It is one of the items that the Tower of Sage granted with the title of Purple. It makes a set with the Ring of Mana.\nPurple represents an abundance of mana, and staying true to its name, the Flower of Purple has a crystal ball on it that boosts Aisha's mana and makes it explode. Since its power was too great, Priscilla made Aisha promise that she would only use it when absolutely necessary.

Leo's favorite encyclopedia on the interpretation of ancient letters.\nIt's actually a 3-volume set, but the second and third volumes were burnt purposely by someone, leaving [First - Letters for curses and healing] as the only book left. Leo always feels upset, thinking that the secrets of the ancient letters could have been revealed if he had the other two books. Meanwhile, the book is locked and bears a mystical spell, making it impossible to read unless the book allows itself to be read.

A belt that Fluss's father gave him when he was appointed Vice Grand Master of the knights.\nIt bears the Eye of the Storm spell that silences the wearer and its surroundings.\n- If you hear the sound of his sword, you'll soon see the petals flying before your eyes.

A golden bell that brings luck.\nIt's Luna's second favorite thing after carrots, and it brightly glitters when she walks and trots. The sound of the golden bell has a mystical power that summons luck from her homeland.

A scale used to decorate Laias's hair accessory, where she has stored her own healing power in case she runs out of energy. When she woke up in the Shrine of Flow by the earnest prayers of Trovatia tribe, she came to think that young Lilia would not be able to protect the children of desert safely if she falls asleep again like she did 100 years ago. After contemplation, she stored her power in the scale so that she could give it to Lilia if anything happens.

A golden arrow created by the divine power of Arch.\nIt summons and materializes the purest and holiest light from heaven, its power increasing according to the amount of divine power given to it. For the good of heart, it's merely a beautiful scene to watch, but if evil creatures are shot by it, they become mutilated and slammed into some non-material dimension.

An old silver cup of the first Vampire Queen.\nQueen used this cup to hold the blood of the one she cherished the most. It is a symbol of her immense sorrow and lunatic pleasure. It is a core item for holy rituals of Vampires, and the ones that go through the ritual of the cup are granted more beautiful and darkly colored Blood Orbs.

A magical circle that allows for cross-galactic travel.\nNyx's dimensional travel begins and ends with this circle. As the rules of galactic travel and the sequence of light and darkness varies according to the spatiotemporal situations, those who do not possess enough knowledge of dimensions cannot use the circle. Nyx can summon anything using this magical circle.

A triplex condensing lens invented by Annette to let Rascal use Blasting Ray.\nThis special lens can be rotated to control its condensing rate and reflection angle, so that the shape of the photons fired can be easily manipulated.\nIf all layers are aligned, Rascal shoots a linear photonic laser, and when the layers are cross-linked, it diffuses the reflection of photonic energy to perform Process of Elimination.

Velkinoth's speedloader that's custom-made for faster reload.
Hot-tempered Mitra used to complain that he wanted to shoot his enemies faster with Velkinoth's crazy rate of fire, but its slow reload speed kept getting in the way. One day, when Mitra was complaining as he always had been, Crow suddenly appeared in front of him.
- Oh? Old... Kugh!
Crow punched Mitra in the stomach, threw something at him, then went away.
- Use that and stop complaining.
Is this just his unique way of showing he cares?

A ceremonial stole bestowed upon the Grand Master of the Holy Knights.\nRicardo made it into an insignia and put it on his armor to boost the morale of his comrades on the battlefield. When the stole waves as he swings Theoria at evil creatures, courage fills the hearts of his allies who see it.

Laughing Mask has a secret training manual of veteran assassins' stealth techniques.\nThis book describes stealth skills and their applications in detail. Tanya added her own tips, making this manual even more valuable.

When Ezekiel made a choker with Manticore's leather, he made a double-layered leather belt along with it. The leather has the unique quality of holding demonic energy and causing insanity, so this belt casts fear on the surrounding area when Ezekiel explodes his demonic power. This binds and immobilizes those with weak minds.

A decoration made with a feather of the Crimson Bird, a beautiful yet dangerous evil beast.\nThe feather usually exudes dark energy, but it illuminates the surrounding area with a red glow when exposed to light. The color is too splendid and brilliant for feeble minds to escape the hallucination it creates.

A decoration that functions as a charm and is made with the fur of Sereblos, the holy sable.\nLegios's electric signals can push the body to its limit, but it is also physically taxing. The sable's lustrous fur absorbs the kickback, significantly reducing the burden on Theo's body. Sereblos's fur works as a conductor that conveys Legios's electric signals to the entire body while protecting Theo's veins with holy energy, allowing him to fight without damaging his body.

A collection of Mediana's special healthy injections. These liquids are all made up of unknown substances and have a mystical glimmer.\nThese were made with folk remedies that Mediana learned from every corner of the continent. Mediana insists that they provide recovery, but their abuse can lead to some extreme results.

A device that adjusts the cracks of time.\nTime manipulation can create cracks in time, and strong energy gathers inside them. Those incapable of controlling the cracks can get stuck and forced to spend eternity in them. However, Oddy, a veteran time sorcerer, crafted this exquisite orb to tweak the cracks of time and used the energy to maximize the performance of Tempodiana.

Jewels that Viska used to store the memory of demons that she thought were yummy.\nShe always felt that their flavors faded away too quickly. When she couldn't find anything nice to eat around her, she came up with a brilliant idea. She thought that taking the dreams out of the Nightmare Jewels that Nightmare Kitrax had and storing her memory of eating delicious prey would allow her to relive those past pleasures. Excited, she imbued the jewel with the memory of eating a delicious demon, and ever since, Viska has been seeking for better-tasting things to put in the jewels.

A weight attached to the bottom of Exilius's grip.\nIt provides Priscilla with better balance, allowing for more stable, precise attacks. When Annette enhanced her halberd into Exilius, she replaced its weight, too. Through Technomagical enhancement, the hardness of the weight was significantly increased with an upgrade that allows her to perform attacks with high precision.

Bracelet that Yanne received from the townspeople when she slayed Svelta.\nMade from Red Dragon leather, it gathers the yang energy inside the wearer to allow them to achieve a high level of concentration. When Yanne takes aim, it helps her successfully fire a single, killing shot.

A treasure that Zafir received from the Mauhata tribe. It's an arrow made with the tail feather of an animal regarded as holy in the ancient kingdom.\nIts radiance is blinding, as if representing the honor and glory of the ancient kingdom. Normally, it's hung on a wall and used in ceremonies, but it's actually one of the best defense weapons used by the royal family. Enemies shot by this arrow face the Judgment of the Desert within a massive sandstorm.

The only shawl in the world that Yuria made with the starlight thread that she personally wove.
Since she travels often, it was always important for Yuria to protect herself from the elements.
Therefore, she decided to make something to keep her comfortable.
The result was this shawl, one that provides temperature adjustment magic to the wearer.
With this around her shoulders, storms or blizzards won't stop Yuria from traveling.
The only downside is that it emits light even during the night.
People who see her from afar mistake her for a fairy or a ghost and get frightened.

A small letter with a sealing wax stamped on it.
It's a telegram containing info or news sent out to the outer base from the capital base, or from the outer base to the capital base.
Due to the nature of their organization, the Resistance prefers to convey information verbally, but there are cases when the info must be scribed and sent in a document form.
This is when Rehartna, who is also a contact, makes her move. Rehartna is best suited for this job because she can move in and out of the capital freely to do 'business' for her atelier.
Rehartna gives excuses such as arranging a deal that involves expensive instruments, and sometimes, she even disguises the letter as a letter of commission from the customer.
To make the disguise look even more convincing, Rehartna uses expensive envelopes and premium sealing wax.

A card made by Witch Eucaletus with all her mana, wishing to be closer to death after her loved one passed away.\nShe was eventually burnt to ashes, leaving only this strange card behind. The card was then known to make its true owner free from life and death, and many people have been fighting over it to attain immortality. Then, a wizard started searching for it to prevent any more meaningless killing, found it, and sealed it away. No one has seen the card for centuries until Ophelia found it in an old storeroom.

The extract of the root of a Snake Mandrake known to grow only once every hundred years.\nRequina found it after searching the entire continent to make the deadliest poison. She made the poison, then named it Tear of Mr. Big Snake. The root extract of the Snake Mandrake causes excruciating pain. The agony is actually the gnawing away of the corrupted part of the soul. If one can endure it, their soul can be purified.

A fragment that fell out from the eternally shining Morning Star.\nMorning Star is the holy light that has existed since the beginning of time, guarding the heavens and protecting the swords of angels from losing their holy flame. The Archangel bestowed this upon Aselica along with the Sword of the Sun before she came down to earth.

A bullet that has teeth marks of a Hellhound.\nThose hit by this bullet are branded with the mark of the Hellhound, which won't disappear until they draw their last breath. No matter how far they run, the teeth of the Hellhound will find them.

A jewel that releases the curses that Shamilla has inside her.\nShamilla sometimes uses this jewel to release curses from her body, just to watch an exciting story unfold according to her plans. The most common curse she releases is petrification, mostly to make sure that the right characters are in play for her scheme.

It was late at night when Lavril found a tent of a wandering fortune teller.
There were strange creatures flying around her, and they were creating a strange atmosphere that made Lavril feel difficult to approach.
The fortune teller sensed her presence and welcomed her.

- Welcome to Stardust Fortune Teller's Tent. What do you wish to know?

Looking at the fortune teller smile, Lavril timidly opened her mouth.

- W-we... we want to make a friend.
A friend who is different than us... A friend who breathes, who we can touch... Wh-where could we meet a friend like that...?

The fortune teller handed her a card, smiling.

On the card that the moon was engraved on, there was a powerful creature drawn on the surface. It was the creature that Lavril feared.
Lavril tried to put the card down instantly out of visceral fear,
But she then felt the creature accepting her touch, as if relieving her anxiety.

Lavril was surprised for a moment, but soon felt at ease.
Then, the fortune teller put her hands on Lavril's.

- You don't have to look far.
Aren't we already good friends?

Finishing her sentence, the fortune teller started moving cards, one by one, still holding Lavril's hands.
The cards were telling things to the fortune teller in silence, as if they wanted to make Lavril's desperate wish come true.

Soon, the cards were all laid out in order and the fortune teller opened her mouth, smiling.

- These boys and girls seem to like you very much.
They are telling me that you're going to meet countless people that you will hold dear.
Before long, you will meet the friends that you've been waiting for.

An ominous whetstone known to hold the soul of a demon.\nSwords that contain a pact of servitude must be sharpened with this whetstone as ordinary ones won't work for them. Used with Enlightening Candlelight, Elsion's resistance against the Demons becomes maximized.

A fang of the Vampire that bit Erze.\nAfter Erze gained the power of blood that she had been craving, she went to this Vampire, brutally murdered it, and took its fang. When the moon is full, she would fiddle with the fang that once had her blood smeared on it, thinking of the past when she used to be a human, before she suffered from the violent thirst for blood.

A hairpin, made with gemstones and coral stones from the Sea of Eternity, that Laias gave to Lilia.\nIt looks like a simple hairpin for a child, but the materials from the Sea of Eternity contain the energy of Water Dragons, making Lilia's Aqua Tempest much more powerful.

An anklet of the Trovatia tribe that's used for the dance to summon the God Dragon in the Shrine of Flow. Only one individual chosen by the great desert can wear it after being tested by the sandstorm. Laudia, the leader of Trovatia, is its current owner. The anklet does not reveal its true powers until it is soaked for days in the holy oasis that only shows itself to the chosen one.

The bible of infinity that a line of Sages of Blessings used to record their works.\nThe title of a sage is passed down with the memories of its predecessor, so it would seem that there is no reason for them to write anything down.\nHowever, the danger of the accumulated memories erasing the identity of the present sage made writing this bible necessary.

A fine sword and the family treasure of the Van Nosenhill family.\nThe Van Nosenhill family has been deemed noble for its production of many outstanding strategists and commanders since the first emperor's reign.\nEver since the sword was bestowed upon the family by the first emperor, the leaders of Van Nosenhill have always carried it with them.

A magic amplifier that contains Black Lightning.\nIt was made with the same materials used to craft Acravita.\nThe dwarves were threatened by Neraxis to craft Acravita, and there were some materials left when they were finished. When the Dwarves asked Neraxis if they could keep the leftover material as a reward for crafting Acravita, he yanked their hair and told them to use it all. As a result, a cartridge containing Black Lightning was created.

A gauntlet made by rare, high-density ores found in the Ziltrion family's mine.\nIt is what Scarlet received from Demia when they exchanged gifts after completing the final part of their swordsmanship training together. Scarlet considers it as a token that proves Demia is her best training partner as well as her closest friend. Scarlet has never used it, worrying that it might get a scratch.

A jewel that the Tower of Sage bestowed upon Sonia with the title of Blue. It has a special function of condensing and amplifying Sonia's lightning energy. The sages in the tower gave her the jewel, hoping that she would stay. However, she left the tower anyway, repulsed by the existence of wizards. She left the jewel in the tower, but at some point during her journey, she realized that it somehow ended up in her pocket.

A brooch crafted by the best blacksmith of Penteonia Kingdom in honor of the beautiful Queen. People call it Queen's Dignity. Made with smithing skills that the blacksmith learned from dwarves, the jewel on it has a mystical power. It can concentrate Artemia's energy of light and release it all at once.

A throwing dagger made by Ricardo that Mirianne used for practice.\nMirianne was the only survivor of a village where elves and humans lived together. When Ricardo took her to the orphanage, he feared that she might close her heart after realizing that she was different from the others in the town. Sonia, who was visiting Orvelia, would be the one to allay his worries. He asked Sonia to look after the little girl and gave her this training dagger to prepare her for the journey.

A mystical flower that contains the energy of life.\nUnlike the flora of pandemonium that grows from evil residue, the flower of life gets nutrients from clean, pure substances such as dewdrops of dawn and the energy of the star-filled Milky Way. The pure energy that the flower stored during its growth becomes a great support to Shea when she plays Green Nature's Melody.

An optical Lens Annette made for Kara.\nShe made it based on the blueprint she discovered while digging Kara out of the ground. The blueprint revealed technology that was far beyond modern engineering, but she managed to interpret some of its content. The result of her study on the blueprint was this lens, which had a similar structure to the eyes of dragonflies. The lens enables the wearer to detect the tiniest of motions and catch sight of the target from hundreds of different angles. She equipped the lens on Kara, the pinnacle of Technomagic, and it resulted in a massive improvement in her attack mode change.

The deep Jungle of Darkness sits in southern Vespia. It is the home, the hunting ground, and the battlefield of the Krakashu tribe. The people in the Empire treat them as barbarians, but they are emotional and sensitive beings that present flowers to their beloved ones.\nFor the Krakashu tribe, the bouquet of flowers means 'return home safe and sound.' This bouquet of flowers handmade by Nia's tribe members holds a spell that keeps the flowers from withering as long as Nia is healthy.

A toy cube that Esker used to play with Ophelia when she was feeling down.
The Cube lets out a gleaming light when the Runic letters are put together,
and starts playing a beautiful melody when completely solved.

Ophelia would often feel depressed that she didn't know what the man of her destiny she met in her dreams looked like.
In such cases, Esker would, just as he did to calm his sister down, take this cube out and let her watch him solve the cube.

A pair of specially made boots that Cecilia used to wear before she got the boots she wears now.
After years of training in different martial arts, she developed her own style of fighting that largely depended on her quick legs.
To prove herself to her grandfather, she trained hard in these specially made boots.
The scuffs and scratches on the boots are glorious scars from those days of intense work.

Crystal fragments sometimes sprout from Kirze's body and fall off.
Unable to toss away what used to be part of her body, she picks them up and collects them.
While being unsure of what to do with her growing collection, she stopped by Orvel, and a glass decoration in May's General Shop caught her eyes.

Kirze thought it was beautiful, and with high hopes, gave all the fragments she collected to May.

In return, May gave her the first piece she made using those fragments - this crimson lotus trinket as a gift.

A jewel attached at the front end of Monolith, made with the fourth heart of Cannibal, the Beast of Arrogance.\nWhen Chase charges at enemies, Cannibal's heart starts to throb, and it explodes the flame of sin blazing inside Monolith upon impact.

Dakaris' favorite and signature dish.
It is one of the dishes that represent his tribe.
It is a dish made with crawfish, clams, and many sides.
He normally eats fish, but dines on this on special occasions.

A standard issue sword of Penteonian Knights that Bernheim used before he fell for Targarios's trap.\nIt is designed to draw out great power when imbued with the power of light. However, one day, Targarios noticed that Bernheim was trying to use other weapons instead of it. Targarios went mad and broke all the other weapons after absorbing all the powers, protections, and blessings they bore.\nBernheim saw it, let out a big sigh, and threw broken metal pieces away, but he decided to carry this sword with him.

It's the symbol of the Capital Guard Knights.\nIt's a badge bestowed upon the Alpha Leader, who has the authority to impose summary justice to secure public safety of the Empire. Elected with unanimous consent, the post of Alpha Leader is for a knight who has unmatched fighting techniques and a high reputation among their fellow knights.

Four potions of different colors and effects make a set, and they boost willpower, concentration, mana, and vitality. May guarantees that this special set of potions have amazing rejuvenating effects, but their ingredients are still a complete mystery. Maybe it's better that way.

You just can't stop throwing punches!\nThe mysterious feather wavering before the eyes pushes Gladi's concentration to its limit so that he can land strikes at a crazy speed. Gladi seems a bit too excited when he's looking at it.

A manual that provides behavioral guidelines for the members of the guild.\nIt is more than 3 times as thick as an ordinary book, and it's proof of Veronica's meticulous nature. It would take a long time for any reader to cover with all of its content.

A basic martial arts that covers the basics that all Orvel knights learn. Among their many skills, Cut Ground provides a solid foundation for a knight's fighting style. It is one of the first skills knights learn, but its complicated mechanism creates a big difference in power between the novice and the proficient. Loman has read it more than a thousand times since he became a knight, and he always goes back to it whenever he feels the need for further improvement.

A ladle that shines with the colors of the rainbow.\nOne day, when Juno was walking around the main street of Orvel, she found a strange ladle that Guild Merchant Kumuro dropped. She tried to return it, but Kumuro smiled and disappeared after saying that the ladle was in the hands of its rightful owner. As an avid cooking tool collector, it was a great gift for Juno. Its colors are not the only thing that sets the ladle apart from ordinary ladles, but it's actually one of the legacies of the ancient civilization. Unfortunately, Juno has yet to find out that this ladle can double the pleasure of eating any food if it's used for cooking it.

A pair of boots made with the leather of monsters rampaging in the Stockade.\nOn the first day that Nicky started working as the chief guard, she was upset to see the monsters wreaking havoc in the place. As the monsters lunged at her, she swung her mace and smashed their skulls with a cold smile on her face. Nicky then skinned the monsters and made a pair of boots out of their leather.\nSince then, none of the prisoners at the Stockade have ever given her any trouble.

A pair of blue bracelets that resembles the thick and lively forest of Elidora.\nOne of the hobbies that Dosarta took up in her lonely hours in the Tower of Challenge was handicraft, and this powerful magical tool is filled with the vitality of Elidora.\nDosarta thinks that they're merely a pair of pretty-looking accessories though...

A hat of Hanus' comrade who recognized Hanus as her comrade on the battlefield for the first time.
Although Hanus had been recruited by the army due to her ingenious craftsmanship, she had to endure all sorts of insults and neglections that were directed to her, just because she was young.
Amidst the hardships however, there was one person who recognized Hanus' ability for the first time.
Starting from then, as time went by, more and more soldiers started to recognize Hanus as their comrades, or even something more than that.
To Hanus, this person was someone precious, and grateful.

However, their friendship came to a temporary halt when Hanus had to change position within the army.
Seeing Hanus cry for the first time, this comrade smiled gently and gave her hat to Hanus which she had worn in battles as a token of friendship and respect.
She promised to see each other again on the battlefield, where both of them fought so hard together.

A gold ring which was equipped to Cain’s body for ritualistic purpose, when Cain's soul-bound body entered a deep slumber called death.\nThe ring, imbued with the blessing of flow by Laias herself, was put onto Cain’s ring finger, so that Cain can enjoy his eternal glory in the afterlife as the God King.\nAlthough it was unexpected for Cain to be awakened by a trivial being, thousands of years have already passed when he awoke. The ring was wrapped in sand and dust, but the jewel imbued with the Blue God Dragon's blessing was still shining brightly as ever.

An azure-colored jewel that adorns the Holy Sword, Aea.\nIt is an intense condensation of sacred nature's spirit, bound by the teardrops of Lua, and has the mysterious power to guide the Guardian of Holy Sword on the path of light.

An old storybook owned by Frey.\nIt was the first storybook ever given to young Frey as a present, and it tells of a war between the Angels and Demons.\nFrey particularly likes the part where the Angels emerge victorious after defeating all the Demons.

A textbook of Fire Magic by the Red Witch.\nThis powerful spellbook is spreading all over the Empire in secret, but most mages consider it as taboo because it casts destructive magic and destroys the caster's mind.

A ring to commemorate Roy's completion of mastering a new skill.\nRoy crafted this ring to celebrate for mastering his new Hacking techniques without relying on the techniques of the Laughing Masks. \nEngraved on the ring is an image of Specter Redeal, which serves as a purpose to overcome the past and remind him of his mistakes.

A bracelet made with a Snowdrop Flower.\nAlthough it was made with clumsy hands, the children at the orphanage made this bracelet as a birthday gift for Gau after seeing him grieve for his fallen Barbarian tribes.\nA Snowdrop means hope and comfort in the language of flowers.

A hammer made of Titanium, the legendary metal forged by giants.\nIt is powerful enough to crush through any legendary weapons and armor. After the Demon War, only 3 of them are known to exist in Orvelia.

A cannon shell Lakrak made in collaboration with Miruru Pirates.\nAfter overcoming many hardships, Miruru Pirates and Lakrak joined hands and worked together for this monster of a weapon.\nThe special Miruru gunpowder added a significant amount of destructive power to Lakrak's cannonball.
A mysterious stone that summons Thunderbird.\nHolding the Thunder Elemental inside, it is a legendary stone that can infinitely bring forth the power of the Thunder Bird.
A magical mirror that reflects the dreams Epis has absorbed.\nSince Epis has been using the mirror to store interesting dreams, it is now filled with countless traces of the deepest of secrets.
A circlet that holds the grace of Notos and Wind Elementals.\nThe Circlet of Wind is passed down through the generations to the best Elven archer, and Selene is its current owner.
A letter of notice issued from Lea's Messenger.\nThis letter created by the Essence of Darkness contains a warning and the terms of the contract that Maria made with the darkness.

A cannonball that Miruru made in collaboration with a new friend who is an explosives expert.\nHaving met last summer, both Miruru and Lakrak developed this special cannonball that is used for igniting the cannon.\nAs the gunpowder has a low ignition point, Miruru has been keeping it safe in a turtle powder keg she found in a treasure ship.

A terrarium made with a broken World Tree twig.\nAs breaking of twigs of the World Tree is considered very bad luck, they are normally purified and discarded.\nHowever, Lorraine received a new revelation from it and decided to make a small terrarium out of it.

A pair of gloves that Clause cherishes the most.\nYoung Kasel and Frey gave him these when Clause was ordained a knight during a particularly cold winter.\nAlthough it wasn't knitted perfectly, each of them knitted each piece with their initials engraved on it.

A specialty of Lamp-keeper Town.\nThis candy that looks like a blue star is Rephy's favorite snack.\nIt is made from 'Jolt out of Sleep,' a blue herb that only grows in Lamp-keeper Town. Every time Rephy leaves town for journey, the village head always puts this candy in his pocket.

The crown of Dark Elves.\nRemebering the fall and tragedy of his race and the royal family, Dimael still can't wear this bloody crown.\nAll he can do is watch it and wait for the day the true king of Dark Elves appears.

A pin that belongs to Reina's mother, a renowned leader of mercenaries in the Empire.\nShe gave this pin to her daughter when she left to Orvel Kingdom all alone, hoping it would cast bad luck away. It can also be used as a weapon in case of emergency.

A present that a possessed female Dragon gave to Pavel.\nThe Ice Dragon always gave him all kinds of gifts, whether Pavel liked it or not. This orb was one of them, and it has a little part of her soul imbued in it.

A ring handed down to the leaders of the Ziltrion Family.\nIt is decorated with a big blue jewel which was bestowed to the Ziltrions by the royal family of Orvel.\nIt was passed down to the leaders as the symbol of the family's eternal loyalty, and these leaders became the vanguards of punishing traitors.

A ribbon that holds the grace of a Wind Elemental.\nSelene gave this green ribbon to Naila, who wanted high speed.\nIt contains a spell of Notos, the Wind Elemental, and it grants Naila rapid and powerful attacks.

A magazine about firearms being issued in the Empire.\nIssued regularly by Magos Le'Flamme, this firearms encyclopedia is Rodina's favorite magazine that contains various information about cutting-edge guns and weapons.\nRodina has more faith in this magazine than she does for other magazines because it is edited under the supervision of Chief Director Valance, who Rodina is a big fan of.
A jewel containing the essence of Temeraire's Fire.\nWhen Temeraire was defeated, Morrah forcibly drew the Jewel of Inferno, the essence of Fire Dragon, out of it to enhance her Fire Smash.

The last journal of a great teacher.
It contains the treatment that Priest Berman carried out for Dark Plague patients, and his own battle with his illness.
Baudouin managed to save this from the flames when they were burning the teacher's belongings after he died. Then, he transcribed it with Leo and named it Berman's Journal, which made a great contribution to Dark Plague treatment.
The original journal is kept by Baudouin in safekeeping, reminding him of his teacher's will.

A doll that looks just like Rephy, Jane's first friend.
Jane froze in front of a shop selling poison.
Seeing Jane's eyes locked on the limited edition of Rephy Doll on the shop display, Epis decided to buy her the doll.
Since the doll could only be purchased with mileage, Epis was almost crying after spending all her pocket money. However, Jane's smile after getting this doll as her first friend was probably worth it.

A mysterious pendant found in ancient ruins.
It was found in the tomb of someone known as the God of Wisdom and Ancient Knowledge.
Aisha bought it at a shop in a back alley, fascinated by its purple jewel.
After she realized that it reinforced her Mystic powers, she named it the Eyes of Truth and has been wearing it often.

A magnifier made with gold passed down to the writers of history.\nIt is a token of recognition owned by the most truthful, unbiased writers of Orvel history.\nThere is no higher honor for a historian than to be awarded with the Golden Magnifier.

A confidential letter that has a wolf seal of the Empire on it.\nFluss, who received the letter sealed by the Emperor, keeps it in safekeeping until it can be handed to the most esteemed princess of Orvel.

Juno's special carrot cake.\nThis special carrot cake was made especially for Luna, who misses her family back in her hometown and the carrots she used to eat.\nAs it has the exact same taste like the ones Luna would eat back at home, the cake has become Luna's new soul food.

A bluish, transparent jewel found where the first Water Dragon returned to the embrace of Mana.\nIt is also known as the Hurt Soul of the First Water Dragon, as people think it contains the sorrow and yearning of the dragon toward its late spouse.\nTear-like ripples form around the jewel when it is placed in the water. This is how it got its name, Tear of God Dragon.

A heavenly bell that rings in the morning star.\nThe bell rings to warn the Angel warriors whenever the earth faces great trouble, letting them know that divine punishment will be needed .\nUpon hearing the bell, warriors realize that the time has come for them to slit the throats of the bringers of apocalypse under Lua's name.

A ring that the underworld Vampire society in Galluah Plains presented to the Scarlet Ruler in respect.
Since then the Vampires show their respect by kissing on the ring.
When Lewisia was born, the previous Ruler passed the ring to her on the spot, proclaiming the birth of the new Ruler.
Little did Lewisia know that the proclamation was actually the beginning of the ordeal she had to go through to become a new Ruler.

A pendant that Nyx used to store the coordinates of numerous magical views he found while traveling the infinite space.\nThe pendant is connected to galaxies in dimension, and the jewel on the pendant changes its color according to the color of the galaxy that is currently connected. One can know the galaxy is gradually moving by looking at the pendant.\nAccording to dimensional coordinates, the jewel on the pendant changes its color.

A battery that Annette developed with her technomagic knowledge using a strange material extracted from a fossil of an ancient civilization.\nIt was initially made to supply backup power to Rascal in emergencies, but it was too powerful that it would overcharge Rascal a little too often.\nAfter thinking about it, Annette decided to use it in combat and customized Rascal's parts to utilize its powers.

A bullet necklace that Valance, the chief of Magos Le'Flamme, made especially for Mitra.
It looks like an ordinary necklace, but it is actually a bullet with devastating explosive power.
With the cutting-edge technology of Magos Le'Flamme, it was made solely to be loaded to Velkinoth. As its ingredients were very rare, making a single bullet took a long time.
Valance decided to call it the Song of Madness, a name that fits the madness that Mitra shows in the battlefield.

The symbol of Ricardo Orphanage, which has a small cross at the center of a bigger one.\nIt was made when the orphanage was built, in the hope that Ricardo's prayers could include the unspoken wishes of the youngest children who did not know any words.\nGreat Priestess Iris also blessed it in the name of Lua, and it is said that it keeps diseases away from children while they grow up.

A secret weapon that the leader of the Laughing Masks made for Tanya.
After watching Tanya flawlessly accomplish countless missions, the leader decided that Tanya was the right one to be sent to the most dangerous of missions and had this secret weapon of Laughing Mask, 'Needle of Silence' delivered to her.
Made with advanced biotechnology, it causes the energy flowing inside the body to regurgitate, killing the opponent in the blink of an eye.
Most importantly, it is something that would help Tanya to keep the vow of silence when things go wrong and the mission is compromised.

Sudden surges of energy on young Ezekiel's right arm left countless wounds and scars on his arms and hands.\nWhen the arm is calm and the blood drips on the floor, his mind would settle with his eyes fixated on the blood.\nEzekiel would wait until the blood stops, pick up a stone soaked in his blue blood, and start carving a small sculpture that looks like his own right hand.

A reed diffuser that Cassandra bought at a black market merchant from the east.
It has a strong scent of azalea.
The liquid inside contains a special substance that stirs people's minds, and those who smelt it for an extended period time would confess their deepest secrets.
Unless there is a dire need of information, Cassandra does not use the diffuser because it is nearly impossible to buy it again.

A funeral doll that Theo asked May to make.\nHe put the doll that looks exactly like him where the tombstone of his eternal love once rested.\nEven when time flows again and he returns back to soil, he would still be by her side.

A strange medical test report that Doctor Aldini gave to his student, Mediana.\nFor a long time, he had kept notes about the autopsies he performed, and handed the records to Mediana, hoping that the traditional art of medicine would live on in her hands.\nFilled with joy, she has read it numerous times, and it was this report that made Mediana's Special Poison possible.

A clockwork device that Oddy made to control the flow of time.
Oddy spent countless days researching and developing the perfect clockwork, but to no avail.
The design was perfect, but he did not have the right catalyst container for his powerful Clock Magic.
No metal on earth would endure the heat for a single tick of the clock.
When he was agonizing over his plan, he remembered something: there was a space stone that Nyx gave him for display.
He ground it to make a clockwork out of it, and the result was perfect.

Crystallized Mana energy of 'Araneck,' a beast that swallowed 'Gluttony' and one of the beasts of 7 sins killed by Viska after she came over to the material world. \nThe crystal has the ability to visualize the force of its owner with a color through the jewel in the center. It was transparent at first, but when Viska touched it, it let out a radiant red light, with a small pattern appearing on the surface.\nThe pattern has grown bigger as Viska's powers grew, and she would sometimes think of what the pattern would look like when she becomes the Dark Lord.

A halberd that Priscilla used for practice.
The storm of war started from this shabby old spear.
She would take it out occasionally to be reminded of her training days.
This is how she could always stay true to his way of life, protecting her Lady against all harms.

When Yanne was requested to kill off the giants, she met the Fire Giant, the leader of them all, and fought three days and three nights to defeat it.\nThe heart of the Fire Giant was pierced, but strong flames were still blazing in it. There, she found a fist-sized stone.\nWhen she took the stone out, the flames died out. Since then, Yanne's arrows have been imbued with flame energy.

It is known that a black cat always stayed next to the God King in the Ancient Desert Kingdom as a symbol of peace and prosperity.\nNo one knows how the sacred black cat appears generation after generation. When the same black cat came to Zafir, he named it 'Hoabis,' and he has been taking care of it wholeheartedly.

Strong but refreshing liquor of Penteonia.
It is one of the best liquors in Orbis, and it's very valuable.
It is Yuria's favorite, but she cannot get her hands on it easily as she travels frequently.
So, she always returns to her home at least once a year to make a dress for the queen, and get a few bottles in return.

A dragon drawn on a paper. The edges of the paper are wrinkled due to the paper’s age.\nIt happened not too long after Rehartna had joined the Resistance: At that time, Rehartna was forced to take a break because she was suffering from a nightmare which occurred every night. In that dream, she was being chased by someone. When Rehartna was cleaning the storeroom to keep herself busy, she found an old drawing. Ever since she was a child, Rehartna would suffer from nightmares whenever she was under extreme stress. One day, when Rehartna was crying after waking up from the nightmare, her brother gave her the drawing and said, ‘This dragon is super strong. It will protect you even in your dreams!’ Upon seeing the drawing, Rehartna remembered the reasons why she joined the Resistance. As for the drawing, Rehartna put it up above her bed, and Rehartna never suffered from a nightmare again.

A thread that the Goddess of Fate uses to tie the fates together.
Only the purest of elementals that do not have any negative karma can tie the thread of fate.
By truly opening her eyes, Ophelia could see the fate of the wider world and sew new fates into its future by using her spirits as a medium.
There is usually a thread piece or two left behind whenever a fate is manipulated, and Ophelia would tie the ends of the pieces and watch them magically fuse and form a string as if they were never apart.
This spool of thread is the result of her habit.

Processed pollen of Kraseir, a yellow flower known to make people laugh to death.\nAlthough classified as a dangerous and poisonous flower, it is not Kraseir itself that has negative effects.\nIt is actually its pollen that contains neurotoxin. Requina grows the flowers in her garden for a stable supply of Kraseir pollen.

A hair accessory decorated with golden laurel leaves and the wing feather of Sacred Bird, 'Illaira'. It shines brightly even in complete darkness.\nIt protects its wearer against curses and burns ominous energy with its light.\nIt was bestowed upon Aselica by the Archangel when she was appointed as a guardian angel.

A carousel music box that Crow's wife Rose liked.
Crow was walking on the street of Orvelia and saw this old music box in the shop display.
He stood still on the road, looking at it for a long time, and went inside the shop. He wound the music box and stood there, listening to the melody silently.
- It's the same one.
- I said I would buy her a new one, but she just liked this old, worn music box.
He murmured quietly, and bought the music box.
In his eyes, his wife was playing the music box to her daughter with a big smile on her face.

The very source of all curses.\nIts root sprouted when hatred was born, and the evil became known to world at the beginning.\nIt is located in deep within Shamilla, the Vessel of Curses, growing more hideous as more curses are derived from it.

Evil Spirits are embodiments of resentment, unable to control themselves due to their overwhelming instincts, driven by negative emotions such as rage and hatred. They are jealous of the living, and openly exhibit aggression to turn the living into new Evil Spirits like them. Lavril, however, is made of the juvenile innocence of children. It is an exception that is too pure to be called an Evil Spirit.

A strange entity whose existence seems ironic. It is haunted by loneliness, even when it is full of countless souls. When she was first awakened in this land, she did not know who or what she was. Only pain and suffering dominated her body, and she lacked a clear purpose. The sorrow from the young souls who had met a painful demise began to form tears, and the exploding powers of the souls called out to other Evil Spirits. They say the vast sky was completely darkened when Lavril was born.

Having heard her terrible cries, the first to arrive was Spiritual Guide Rephy. Learning about Lavril's plight from other souls, he was able to locate her with help from Oddy and Nyx.

Rephy offered her many different gifts to stop her from crying, and this is what caught her eyes the most. This is a type of precious jewel left behind by vengeful Evil Spirits when they are banished. It is the last trace of a unshackled soul who has finally found freedom from evil. This jewel is believed to have soothed Lavril's deep sorrow.

The Eight Trigrams that the first leader of Shadow Hilt Family received from a supernatural being.
Only the leaders of Shadow Hilt can handle it and maximize the power of Elsion through the demonic energy stored inside.
8 different beasts that punished evil are sealed in the trigrams, and different forces arise based on whether each trigram is pointing to yin or yang.
When all 8 trigrams point toward perfect yin, the full moon raised by the Cold Blooded Witch is redder than the thickest blood.

A piano played by Erze on the Festival of Blood held on full moon's night.
When her unquenchable thirst for blood finally settled down after razing a peaceful town to the ground, she found herself standing in complete silence on the blood-soaked ground.
There was not a life that did not belong to her, and it made her want to play a beautiful tune for her silent audience.
The sonata echoed around, over the mountain of dead bodies.

A sacred key found in the center of the oasis.
When the tribe was performing an evil-purging ritual for the First Water Dragon, a strange chest floated up in the center of oasis.
No one could open it until Lilia came, summoned by her tribespeople.
The chest started shaking as soon as Lilia approached, and it opened on its own after releasing a bright light.
Inside the chest was a key.
Lilia knew as soon as she saw it that it was not an ordinary key and has been keeping it safe until now.
What it opens is still unknown, but it is certain that the key maximizes Lilia's purifying powers.

Earrings that the God Dragon Laias bestowed upon Laudia. On the last day Laudia performed the ritual for the God Dragon at the Shrine of Flow, Laias finally opened her eyes.
Then, some orbs of water appeared around Laudia, releasing blue, blinding light.
The orbs landed upon the hands of Laudia and became a beautiful pair of earrings.
It was a gift blessed by the oasis, the token of gratitude that Laias gave to Laudia in recognition of the painstaking effort Laudia made to bring her back.

The holy sword that Lucias used when he was under Ricardo's command as a Holy Knight.
High priests of Lua blessed it directly, imbuing it with strong holy energy.
Lucia was later chosen as the Saint of Blessings, and his blessings are actually much more powerful than the blessing invested in the sword.

He always carries the sword to remember his days as the Holy Knight, but he never draws it.
Gossipers say that it is because he fears he would not look like a saint if he is to be seen wielding a sword...

The core of Arc Lumineir and a Mana source that disperses lights of certain wavelength.\nThis mineral was a very powerful artifact to use elemental spells with, but it was not hard enough to withstand stronger magic.\nThe technomagic of Magos Le'Flamme greatly enhanced its hardness, and now it is used as an optical weapon.

Neraxis stole this treasure from Armarta's repositorium.
He wanted to have a stronger weapon than Acravita, and came to think of Armarta's repositorium.
He went to Ashen Peak, the ruins south from Arrovina Shore, and snuck into the repositorium.
On the way out, he had to confront Armarta, who was mad and crazy, but it was worth it as he got everything he wanted.
Among the most precious ones were the 'Ashen Nova,' which makes a pair with 'Ashen Nox'.
Its power can be compared to the heart of a Black Dragon.

Blacksmith Jin especially worked on this jewel for Scarlet of Orvel.\nIt was made as a pendant at first, but later was crafted again into a charm that Scarlet could put on and take off from her armor and clothes when she joined the war as a knight.\nWhen she was in the battlefield with the Heart of Silver, soldiers would think of her as the goddess of victory.

An artifact crafted by Sonia herself that contains the enormous lightning energy generated from her heart.
When the core of Baikal within her broke loose, Sonia's lightning energy would overflow and cause an inner explosion. 
She could not release the power as it could hurt Mirianne. Out of concern, Mirianne suggested that she make an artifact that could control it.
It took Sonia a long time to make this pair of gloves durable enough to withstand her lightning energy.
The result exceeded her wildest expectations.
What she made was an enormous reserve of energy, which enabled her to use and control the energy without having to worry about exhaustion.
Moreover, the gloves would protect Mirianne from possible explosions, which made Sonia proud.

A mystical mirror that contains the spells of royal elder wizards, passed down to generations in the royal family of Penteonia.
It is known that the first king made it himself for the eternal prosperity of Penteonia.
Only the leader of the country could look into it, and the one standing in front of the mirror receives the blessing of light.
This would then lead the kings to be the light themselves to all his people in the country.

A leaf necklace Mirianne's mother made to celebrate her birth.
Her mother, praying that her beloved daughter would grow up in the town of Ella without harm, stuck an Elven jewel of luck into the wooden pendant.
However, destiny had other plans, as Ella was invaded by demonic creatures. She died, leaving all that is left in her into Mirianne's necklace.
It protected Mirianne until Ricardo found her, and the necklace crumbled into dust after serving its purpose.
Ricardo pitied Mirianne, the lone survivor of Ella.
A few years later, he asked Loman to make a similar necklace and gave it to Mirianne.

When Shea sang the song of life with the spirits for the creatures on earth, Mira, the goddess of love, gave her this jewel in return in her dream.
When Shea woke up, she found it in her hand.
The jewel shines like the goddess of love herself, and people would feel amazed by just looking at it.
Shea decided to call it the Dream of Mira.

When Annette excavated Kara, she found this drawing with the blueprint of the optical lens.\nOn the old and worn piece of parchment was a drawing of different mechanical structures, annotated with an unknown language.\nWith Leo's help, she could vaguely translate the content of the drawing. Over the years of research, she could finally complete 'Kara,' the product of the most advanced technomagic.

Even though Nia's blood was more stable than her forefathers', there were times when it boiled to the point where Nia almost lost her mind.
This special treatment is a unique type of poison that Mediana and Requina made by the request of Yanne, who found out about Nia's status.
This poison only attacks the Demonic Blood inside Nia, and it takes one sip to keep her calm.
This treatment has a side effect, however, that causes her digestive system to malfunction, during which meat-loving Nia has to stay away from meat.
Therefore, Nia tries her best not to use this stabilizer.

A strange gambling chip used in black market gambling houses.\nThis is the most valuable chip of them all, and only the best adventurer in the secret gambling house could own it.\nIt looks like a regular golden gambling chip, but it holds life forces of countless souls due to the spell of Dark Wizards cast on it.

A gift that Cecilia received in return for her first-ever act of justice.\nIn the past, a little girl that Cecilia rescued tied this red ribbon around the wound she got while saving the girl from danger.\nThereafter, she always wore it on her wrist while on her missions, and people started to call her the Crimson Wind of Justice.
