Sewing tool that Kirze uses for her hobby.
It is a must for her doll making pastime.
Recently she was able to get her hands on special kinds of string and cotton.
She can happily make better dolls with them.

On the side note, the scissors are miniature version of her weapon.

A life form sensor that was installed on Chase's waist.
It looks like a small, oval capsule, and is designed to be inserted in the bodies of test subjects.
Stamped on the capsule is the test subject code name, 'Type. 0,' and it contains a strange red material that stores information.
This biometric sensor can store various tests and research information and logs the information of the test subject's location.
If someone tries to take it out with force, it will self-detonate and kill the test subject to keep the experiments confidential.
When Chase ripped this out of his waist, he broke it instantly. This small thing had been distorting his soul for too long.
Then, he made a promise himself.
He wanted to make those who drove him to misery tremble in fear, just from hearing his name.

A spellbook passed down from generation to generation.
This is renowned as a history book passed down to the next sage of the tribe.
It holds history of war, footsteps of great individuals, everyday life of the tribe, and many more.
It has mystical power to bring those records out into reality for a little while via magic.

Letters that Bernheim wrote to his family after his banishment.\nHe still has not decided whether or not to send them until now, after 7 years have passed from his banishment.\nThe letters are mainly addressed to his brother and sister who were 5 and 10 years younger than him when he was banished.

A golden trophy awarded to Glenwys for winning 3 consecutive Imperial Colosseum Tournaments.
It's the Emperor's gift to the true hero of the Colosseum.
The third championship match was the last tournament match in which Glenwys fought in.
Her last opponent was a mysterious man with a mask who defeated all his opponents throughout the tournament in less than a few seconds. Glenwys was nervous when she saw him fight in the semi-final match. As expected, the fight was one-sided.
A man swung a pair of red swords at Glenwys like a red storm. She waited for an opportunity while blocking his fierce attacks. The man finally seemed to let his guard down, and Glenwys launched a powerful strike.
But to her surprise, the man dodged it simply by taking a few steps back. 
However, the explosion caused by Glenwys's attack made the man's mask crack, revealing his handsome face. She then saw, through the breaking mask, that the man was smiling.
Noticing that her attack didn't leave a scratch on him, Glenwys raised her shield up again, appalled, but the man suddenly threw the towel.
Soon, the smoke around the two people cleared, and there was another mask on the man's face.
Shocked and astonished, Glenwys could not understand what had happened until the Emperor handed her the trophy, until she saw the man standing behind the Emperor with the Royal Guard Captain, giving her a warm applause.

An ultra-rare, super-limited snack set that May bought at the Very Amazing Magic Toy shop in Orvelia.
This is the masterpiece of the shop owner, never to be sold again.
Unlike the phrase [Warning! Do not eat, ever! Ever!] written on the box, the snacks inside look incredibly yummy.
However, it was actually made to be used for 'very nasty pranks,' and it explodes when thrown, and its destructive power is proportional to the amount of Mana that the thrower has.
After the explosion, the snack powder gathers on its own, becomes snacks again, and returns back to the box.
May, with her heart throbbing, put the cute, dangerous, and strange snack box into her cart.

A roll of elastic bandage that Gladi wears around his fists when someone really needs a good punch to the face.
It was a present that his master gave him a long time ago.
Gladi rarely gets mad after he started to work at the shop in the Arena, but he would take the bandage out for nasty customers who keep whining that they need weapons that exceed their capabilities, or those who dishonor the War God, whom he respects dearly.
Gladi is a big-hearted man who knows how to let things go with a good laugh, but if you see him wrapping the bandage around his fists silently,
that could be your last day.

A compilation of guild account reports that Veronica makes every month and every year. No one can process these documents as perfectly as she does.\nThose who saw the height of documents piled up would immediately walk out of the room every single time.\nThese piled documents are the evidence that shows why Veronica is the Top Financier.

A shield that Loman used in the past. It is his treasure that his father, who was a gatekeeper of the royal family, gave him.\nAlthough he has not used it since he started using his halberd, he has kept the words of his father in his heart: be the gate that protects Orvelia.\nWhatever may come, Loman will never allow the edge of an enemy sword to cross the gate of Orvelia while he breathes.

An apron Juno won for winning First Place in the Continental Cooking Master Competition.\nIt is the honorable reward presented to the best chef in all of Orvelia by the legendary chef, Amelia.\nBefore Juno opens her restaurant every morning, she wears this apron with pride.

A black manicure that Nicky puts on the day of waste disposal in the Stockade.
Nicky always hated when her nails would be stained with blood after completing waste disposal'.
Different monsters had different blood colors, and her nails would get very messy after.
One day, she was letting loose a stream of abuse, infuriated by her messy nails, when she saw a lady with nails of various colors and came up with an idea.
If she didn't like her nails getting stained with different colors, all she had to do was put some dark color on her nails beforehand!
She picked the monsters with the darkest blood and made a bottle of special manicure. She now applies it on her nails every waste disposal day.
When she comes into the Stockade with her nails in black, all the prisoners shiver in fear of death.

Aulen, the Bird of Wind, is a symbol of the royal family of Elidora.
Its blue feathers are known to raise a soft, refreshing wind.
Selene used to have a pet Aulen that Dosarta took great care of.
When Dosarta left her home to the Tower of Challenge, Selene made this quill with a feather from her beloved Aulen to make her feel close to it all the time.
Dosarta has never used it since she got it, and she just keeps it in a safe place.

A medal Hanus received for her numerous, remarkable achievements she accomplished during her time in the Guild Allied Forces.
As a great tactician, Hanus always brought advantages in battles, and the army bestowed the medal to her in recognition of her achievements.

Such recognition was unprecedented considering Hanus' age and experience, and those who did not know Hanus well complained to the higher ups in envy of her accomplishments. However, after seeing Hanus in battle once, they did not dare to complain about the army's decision.
Hanus, even after being transferred to the instructor position due to her father, still keeps this medal, and reflects upon it whenever she wishes to go back to battlefields.

A historical archive that contains the history of Sekireinel.\nAfter the awakening, curious of how the story of ancient Sekireinel and his brother were passed down to the future generations, Cain asked Zafir to bring him the historical records.\nThe archive which Zafir brought to the God King is known as the most accurate record among other records of the tribes, since it is the record written and updated by the generations of the archivist family of Sekireinel, which they guarded with their life in the times of wars and turmoil.
A mysterious brazier crafted by ancient Elves to honor the mother nature. It is the pinnacle of their magic, capable of producing an infinite amount of mana.
A glass made from the horn of a sacred bull that roams the sky. It is a magical drinking horn that embodies the essence of abundance.
A die used in an ancient civilization for divination. Each face is engraved with mysterious illegible letters.
A curious golden statue in the shape of a golden cat, the symbol of good fortune. Sometimes it seems as if the cat is waving its paw.
A pocket watch that can fast-forward time slightly to provide a quick glimpse of one's destiny. Excessive use may prove to be quite dangerous.
This primer, which chronicles the stories of past heroes, is considered a bible for any new hero. It's written in ancient letters.
A scope created by an ancient technomagi. A useful tool that can zoom into a faraway object to a good level of detail.
An eerie gold statue designed after a roaring tiger. Under the right conditions, the tiger wakes up and makes everything around it tremble in fear.
It's said to be one of the sacred artifacts bestowed by the goddess. A miraculous remedy said to heal any injury.
A golden mask once worn by God King of the desert. It is enchanted with the spell of absolute authority to protect its owner.
A bronze mirror of an Ancient Technomagic Kingdom that a genius wizard gifted to his wife. It is inscribed with a rune for protecting a loved one.
A chain said to be once used by the God King of the desert to fetter his slaves. Those who are restrained by this chain cannot resist at all.
A mask modeled after the face of a Goblin. It's actually kind of cute.
A mask modeled after the face of a Harpy. The sound of a brisk wind can be heard.
A mask modeled after the face of an Orc. It inspires a brutish desire for combat.
A mask modeled after the face of a Dark Elf. It gives off an aura of the soft moonlight.
A mask modeled after the face of a Demon. Evil whispers can be heard from it.
A mask modeled after the face of a Skeleton. It smells like death.
One drop of it is said to become available every hundred years at the Soul Spring. A very rare and effective panacea.
A pile of old exotic talismans that drives away harmful spirits. They are rendered useless for a while once used.
A blessed bracelet once created by the Holy Knights of the Church of Lua. It's an antique magic tool, and only a few like this remain today.
A mask modeled after the face of a Lizardman. The aura of a sage can be felt from it.
A miniature version of one of the 'faces' of the Mountain Fortress. This lively and flamboyant face feels sentimental and looks beautiful.
A miniature version of one of the 'faces' of the Mountain Fortress. A keen intellect can be felt from this taciturn face.
A miniature version of one of the 'faces' of the Mountain Fortress. The rage and bellicose nature of this angry face can be felt.
A miniature version of the core of the Mountain Fortress. As a source of infinite energy, it boosts the power of the owner.
A mask modeled after the face of a Frost Giant. The power of a snow mountain can be felt from it.
The crest used by the Guardian Knights of Orvelia prior to the Demon War. The stalwart resolve of the knights can be felt from it.
An ancient sorcerous dagger thought to be used for assassinations. It is enchanted with a vile spell that disrupts mana.
A deck of Tarot Card containing unfathomable magic. Appears to be a lost property of someone. It is said to be crafted by Eucalytus the witch to honor the death of her loved one.
A magic tool sculpted into the shape of the Sun. Made from a stone embodying the essence of fire, it has the power to cleanse and purify all evil energy surrounding its wearer.
Orbs shared between two lovers. They represent the eternal companionship of two souls even when they are apart.
A book with evil black magic. It is filled with many spells that the devil has taught to mankind.
A mask modeled after the face of a Draconic. It resonates with the roar of smoldering evil.
An ominous ring inhabited by evil spirits from your worst nightmare. When enchanted by this ring, you lose control over your body while your soul becomes trapped within an endless dream.

A feather containing an alchemy equation of the exchange of equivalents. The equation will activate when the enemy's name is engraved on the user's body, weakening the enemy and its owner for a short period of time.
A vase dedicated to the tomb of a fallen general from the Demon War. Within it flows water from the river of Eden, glistening brilliantly.
A veil that may seem too eccentric and florid to be used by an assassin, but is, in fact, a magic tool that dulls the target's senses.
A miniature version of the fingernail ornament that Protianus was wearing. A highly expensive magical artifact made from enchanted gold.
A mystical weapon designed after the trident of Protianus. It bears the power of water like a tsunami.
A miniature version of the ring that Protianus was wearing. It is enchanted with a spell that curses and neutralizes foes.
A blue gem that was once set on the crown of Protianus. A clear gem that represents protection.
A blazing greatsword of Velkazar, the Hellspawn Torturer. Its flame seems powerful enough to engulf anything.
A blazing tail of Velkazar, the Hellspawn Torturer. It looks like a serpent shrouded in flame.
A blazing bond of Velkazar, the Hellspawn Torturer. It's enchanted with Black Magic to control the overflowing power.
One of the blazing horns of Velkazar, the Hellspawn Torturer. It works as a channel to release the power of soul.

Book of a mad wizard who wandered about the wilderness. The cursed book created from human blood and skin. It consumes mana to grant berserk status to the owner without compromising their sanity. However, it continues to consume mana, ultimately bringing destruction to its owner as it depletes their mana.

Ancient flute made from the bones of Orox, the guardian beast of snow mountains. It contains the charm of gales, which boosts the morale of warriors. Warriors may experience a slight increase in their speed when they hear its sound.
Lion made from silver. It is the symbol of Orvel Royal family, and its eyes are made from blue sapphire. It is imbued with the longing to safeguard the kingdom, protecting the owner from evil.
A mysterious object shaped like a sad pumpkin. It is said to make an eerie noise while hovering near the owner.
A mysterious object shaped like a mad pumpkin. It huffs angrily while hovering near the owner.
An exotic specialty that comes from a faraway land across the sea. It is said to be eaten during the celebration of harvest.
A star ornament that blesses the sacred nights. It rises up to the sky and shines.
An item to blow away the worries of 2017 for a fresh new start in 2018.
A mystical charm said to get rid of bad luck and bring good luck. It's created by a famous foreign designer of magical goods.
A small chick figure toy that represents the innocence of children.
This delicacy of Orvel is a must for anyone who can't stand the blazing summer heat.\n\nOne sip of it brings down the heat, another makes the heat go away.
A brilliant necklace befitting Moon Rabbit LuLu.\nIt is made from the refined fragments of a full moon.\nThe magical power of the full moon seeps into the wearer's entire body the moment it is worn.
A mysterious item shaped like a happy-looking pumpkin. It boosts the energy of the owner.
A peculiar item shaped like a pumpkin with a surprised look. Its eerie ambiance startles those who look at it too.
Encyclopedia for Hybrid Animals in Orvelia Continent. As a limited edition copy, it has a silhouette of Hybrid Animals embroidered with golden thread.
Perfume used by legendary Golden Queen. It is the legendary perfume which can tempt anyone who smells the scent.
Crystal Music Box found in the ruins of Republic of Galluah. It has a beautiful yet sad melody.
An amethyst pendulum that has the power to drive away the dark energy, and detect negative energy.
A golden statue of a goddess holding a laurel branch. It brings victory to its owner.
A component found from an ancient and mysterious machine. It is suspected to be a part of a teleportation device.
Heart Cotton Candy, a must-have item for outings!\nIt melts in your mouth in no time!
The Power source of Abyssal Goddess Xanadus. It looks like the its pupil moves, even though it's been severed from its body.
Hair accessory of Abyssal Goddess Xanadus. The serpent-shaped crown gives off a deadly scent.
Nail ornament of the Abyssal Goddess Xanadus. It is made from an alloy of unknown but special metals.
It is the must-try food for Thanksgiving. The freshly roasted turkey dish goes well with Hero's Inn special gravy sauce.
A miniature of the legendary Christmas tree. It does not grant wishes anymore, but it still has the finest quality that makes the holy night beautiful.
This uplifting fanfare of trumpets spreads the blessing of the newly rising sun.
In recognition of your outstanding excellence, superior performance, and good conduct, we hereby confer this medal to you. \n- Principal Rephy

During ancient times, God King Cain led the desert kingdom of Sekireinel to a golden age.\nThis is a commemorative coin crafted from the gold he extracted from the desert.\nIt holds mysterious power that makes one feel the sun's power and heat when held.
An artifact told to have been in Hexipolia's possession before he used the dice.\nIf you watch the pendulum move left and right, it feels as if the pendulum will suck you into a world of fantasy.

They say there are those who go by the title, Master Chef.
It is a title given only to the best chefs who created a new paradigm in the history of cooking.
This rare book not only contains the best recipes in the world, but also contains information on how one can obtain the ingredients that are used in those recipes.

The book of course, also explains how challenging and dangerous it is to find those ingredients...

One interesting fact is that the signature dish of the first master chef who wrote this book is a sandwich.

A healthy stew made with the healthy ingredients all over from Orbis.
Having full of minerals and other nutrients, it is a powerful dish that can restore the vitality of anyone who eats it.
The price is not too expensive, which makes it available for everyone.
This is Juno's specialty dish full of love and her pride for the weary ones visiting the Hero's Inn.

A dessert made by using the gelatin of a Slime.
Mixed with the juice of fruit, sugar, and other sweeteners, all it takes to finish it is to heat the mixture and cool it down.
Juno did not want the dessert to be named after her since it was made of monsters, but Yanne has secretly added Juno's name on the menu...

Beware- this dessert may turn back to a slime if left unattended.

The 'Red Hawks' were a party of adventurers that disappeared years ago. They were just a small band of 7 adventurers, but they accomplished many things. There were rumors that they were the guardians of the ancients reincarnated again. The leader, the Knight of Peace Parvita, was known to be a calm and noble woman.

A hat perfect to wear on a sunny day. A must-have item for summer.
A luxurious dress with frills. It's as beautiful as magic.
A fist protector that is an absolute necessity for fighters. It's been worn out after years of training.
A headband of a passionate martial artist. It overflows with burning energy.
Shoes for fighters that need to be quick. They will stop you from slipping on any surface.
A uniform for martial artists who need a strong body and mind.
A document certifying the provision of supplies.
A document used to make contracts between guilds.
A document used by the highest ranking officers of a guild.
A wooden sculpture crafted by an amateur sculptor. It looks crude but seems to be filled with affection.
A sculpture crafted in memory of a loved one. Delicate and beautiful.
A sculpture offered as a token of loyalty and devotion. A mysterious and magical aura resonates around it, and you can feel the sculptor's passion for art.
An egg boiled to perfection.
A set of high-quality tableware usually used for presentation.
A set of kitchen tools crafted by Blacksmith Jin with Magical Steel.
Leather bracelet crafted to fit the female wrist. Its metal ornaments stand out.
Luxurious muffler made from the finest fox fur.
Coat with a brilliant pattern that draws attention. Most people won't be able to pull off something this flamboyant.
A willow pipe made from a twig. It sounds similar to a bird tweeting.
A bookmark made with a leaf preserved with magic. The spell cast on it prevents it from deteriorating.
The bestselling magazine in Orvel Castle. \nThis is a must-read for trendy people.
A pinwheel made with colored Rune paper. Its beautiful glitter attracts Wind Elemental, soothing Dosarta's loneliness.
A special battle ration set of the Guild Allied Forces.\nThe rations are made with ingredients of highest quality, all imported by the trade guild.\nThe rations contain perfectly balanced nutrition.
An emergency medical kit used by the Guild Allied Forces.\nThis item has exceptional healing potential.
A set of limited edition clothes for Mini Hanus.\nIt is the best gift one can give to Hanus.
A toy set used to plan war strategies.\nFor a mere set of toys, it is quite realistic.
A weapon that can turn into various shapes, used conventionally by desert warriors.
Aged liquor created with the Aeginan Dragonfruit. It is completed by aging the liquor for a long time in the desert sands.
A gold statue that resembles the cat that stayed beside Cain when he reigned as the God King.
The water containing the blessing of Laias. It can be acquired inside the Shrine of Flow.

A handwritten letter by Laias to commemorate the dead, and relieve the feeling of longing. The letter explains the situation of Sekireinel after Cain's death, and Laias’ prayer to the soul of Cain so that he may rest in peace.

The unwavering love of the one who yearns for his dearest and endearing Jane, and the ardent wish of Jane to meet that person became the very seed that was planted in Erekura. Whenever Jane recovered her lost emotion, the seed entwined deeper with Jane and took the form of a thorny vine that protects her.\nThe soul of Erekura which started sprouting and extending its reach bloomed every time her emotions became stronger and deeper, as if it was resonating with Jane.\nWhen Jane finally reunited with the one whom she yearned for so dearly, the slumbering flower buds resonated with her overjoyed heart and fully blossomed into flowers. Wherever the pollen from these bloomed flowers touch, the place becomes covered in flowers of the fallen republic, leaving scarlet hills behind.

A strong soul that manifests Ricardo’s conviction as well as his faith towards Lua.
The soul of Theoria, with its foundation built on the will to protect everything they believe in and loves, takes the form of a holy golem.
Just like Ricardo's unflinching resolve that triumphed over countless battles throughout decades, Theoria is a symbol of indomitable will.

Just like how the Holy Sword Aea emitted immense power of light and turned the lands nearby holy when it first appeared, Theoria with its soul unleashed purifies all energy in its vicinity, guiding the light and abolishing darkness in process.
In the wake of the hallowed light of this soul, the corrupted shall lose their power and be banished.
The purified souls will find eternal peace in Lua’s light.

...At least that is what Great Priestess Iris thinks.
To Ricardo, perhaps this power is the reason behind the extension of his retirement...

Carprain was originally a weapon tailored for the use of a human warrior, but it became distorted after falling into the hands of Morrah, the Draconic Commander.
The power of lava and fire of Carprain imbued by Temeraire became tainted by Morrah’s destructive willpower, and this sword became more and more corrupted after absorbing countless blood of dragons from battlefields.
Ultimately, Carprain, the sword originally crafted to be wielded by the protector of the world, transformed into a sword of destruction.

However, Morrah, after absorbing God Dragon Oricana during the final battle of the Demon War, experienced changes in her soul. And this in turn, influenced Carprain as well.
The power of darkness within Carprain had evolved anew after being exposed to Oricana’s strength.
Despite being a weapon of a Draconic, Carprain came to contain the light of protection which guards all life, not the power of death and destruction.

A sword of flame, imbued with light and reborn with the holy soul contained within, had become a guardian of flame that protects precious ones.

Exian was always there with Clause. Exian saw how Clause swore to protect the ones precious to him, how he refused to be discouraged even facing loss, and how he cried in despair after losing his family. Exian has always regarded Clause's conviction and courage highly, and whenever Clause cried and directed his fury, Exian did the same. Ultimately, Exian resonated with Clause’s soul and unleashed its full power.\n'-Guardian knight, I shall guard you from now on, so that your conviction will never break!'\nExian’s power, awakened through ancient magic and ironclad will, shall accompany the unbreakable knight in his journey, even if the path is perilous and twisted...

The soul of Legios had existed as a part of Transcendent of Lightning since the early ages. However, over the course of time, it gradually lost its power while being caged inside a pair of spears by a Red Dragon blacksmith.
Legios decided to stay dormant until one worthy to carry the title of the Transcendent appeared. When Theo picked up Legios, it resonated strongly with Theo's soul, waking up from its long slumber. When Legios opened its eyes, Theo started feeling the presence of a great soul bound to the pair of spears. Despite Theo and Legios’ effort to match the wavelengths, as Legios recovered more of its power, it started having detrimental effects on Theo’s body.
The alteration in Legios’ wavelength due to a swing of emotion started to influence Theo’s soul which became more and more sporadic. It was not until when he met his lady whom he lost 100 years ago that Theo’s soul would become stabilized.

The soul of Theo and Legios started matching each other’s wavelength, and together, they became truly worthy to be called as the new Transcendent.

In the past, there was a dark lord who became consumed by endless voracity and thirst.
He proceeded to become an embodiment of catastrophe who consumed everything in his path like a plague, and became known as the ‘Kiln of Futility.’

To stop this voracious dark lord from ravaging the world, the young prince of Penteonia desperately challenged the dark lord, and defeated him. The dark lord was then sealed inside the sword named Targarios and was moved to the central church of Penteonia.
Even in his sealed state, Targarios searched persistently for an innocent lamb who would free him from the seal. He continuously whispered his voice of temptation, and finally, his wish was fulfilled when Bernheim took Targarios into his hands. Though he had an atrocious past behind, the former dark lord became an entity with an extremely bizarre personality, and he managed to sense the darkness residing deep within Bernheim, who sort of gave him freedom.

Targarios, upon examining Bernheim’s inner shadow of consciousness which Bernheim himself is unaware of, decided that he will get along nicely with Bernheim, a rather poor human struggling to reach for the light. Even though his body is sealed inside a sword, Targarios will proudly show its power as the dark lord of futility, whenever Bernheim wishes for strength.

The Holy Sword Aea was Lua’s protective will realized, and the essence of Lua’s love towards the world. However, the moment the warrior reached the light with Aea in his hands - even after finding out the harsh truth - her love took the form of a brilliant ray of light and shined solely only for the warrior.
-'I was created to protect this world.
However, from now on, I shall serve you solely as your sword in your mission. Noble, righteous warrior with a sublime heart, I give you my sincerest respect.'
She smiled brightly and blessed Kasel. So long as Kasel is determined to protect those precious to him, not because of Lua’s mission, but because of his own volition, Aea’s light will eternally shine upon him.

A magical weapon Sonia crafted for Mirianne, Riventina.
When Sonia infused the power of lightning into Riventina, Baikal within Sonia also infused part of itself into the new weapon.

Mirianne learned, experienced, and felt many aspects of life as time passed by, and the shard of lightning within Mirianne’s dagger grew with her.
The shard would shift its shape to project Mirianne’s emotion, experience, and her way of life.

The shard stayed with her, and watched over her whenever she went on an adventure to bring back her lost memory, whenever she suffered from nightmares and spent the night without getting any sleep, and whenever she concealed her tears with laughter.

The shard of lightning watched her journey unfold, and stayed by her side, waiting for the day it will become a strong power of lightning, powerful enough to protect Mirianne...

Blades always carry with them a vile stench of blood and death. Sometimes, one might hear the scream of the victims the blades fell. It is a symbol of Laughing Mask, and the proof of the cruelest killer.
Roi, upon realizing that he will neither escape nor ignore this weapon, swore to remain as the last wielder of this weapon, no matter the what it costs.
’-I will not deny any sins that I have committed in the past. I will embrace them all, and walk as a shadow.’
It was that moment, a specter reaper made his appearance from the dark, as if he was rising up. The reaper's aura of death was so strong that it felt like it would consume Roi at any moment, but his eyes were also beaming with bizarre curiosity.

That was when Roi realized that the reaper will be watching his every move, until the day he meets his end.

Arlaq was supposed to carry the power of a Soul Weapon through Cain.
When Laudia was first bestowed with the awakened Arlaq as a Soul Weapon, she recognized a fragrance which is feint, yet existent. However, the fragrance had disappeared when she attempted to get a whiff of its smell after going through numerous incidents.
After a few trial-and-errors, Laudia realized that Arlaq must be fully awakened in order to invigorate that fragrance. At the end of severe training, Laudia was finally rewarded.
Laudia was dancing as if she was being guided by a sandstorm when a captivating fragrance pleasantly entered her system from both her hands. After the dance, Laudia was struck with enlightenment that she had just achieved the zenith of blade arts.
It marked the birth of the greatest Desert Dancer of all ages. Arlaq accepted Laudia as one worthy of its power, and granted her its maximum power.
Arlaq’s fragrance is no longer just a simple scent with captivating odor. Now its ever-alluring fragrance is capable of completely bewitching its target, shaking the willpower of the target at very core.

This irresistible fragrance, when blended with Laudia’s dance, can charm both sight and smell of living beings.

When Cain first locked his eyes on Tyrannicus on the throne, he came to fully understand what the true throne of the God King is.

The form of Tyrannicus’ soul was the throne of God itself, and the light it emitted was truly fitting of the title: sun.

After seeing the authority of the God King which eyes of other beings cannot perceive, Cain paid his utmost respect to the brilliance of Tyrannicus, and swore to become one worthy of the weapon. Ultimately, he rose to become the perfect king that reigned upon the desert.
Tyrannicus responded to Cain and accepted him, as if it was rewarding Cain’s efforts. Tyrannicus deeply resonated with Cain's soul, and helped Cain rule the desert by sharing the wisdom of the king of acumen.

Shamilla, after tearing her own wings apart, lived and walked among the humans.
At times, she lived as a noble, and at times, she lived as a commoner.
She manipulated and made humans act as she desired, editing the script of the world as she fits, and feasted upon hatred, resentment, and sadness which were the products of conflicts her manipulation caused.

Shamilla however, found herself drowning in tedium.
She deeply wished to see and experience unexpected situations from the actors of her script which she had edited thousands of times.
Shamilla was hungry for new emotion, one she had never felt before.
She wanted to feel the fresh, mystical curse, one that had never existed.

Shamilla then came up with a thought: If there is someone who's different from me, but has similar purpose, perhaps then, I might reach my goal faster, and find a different ending.

After closing her thought, she imbued her wings with a part of her soul, and...

A descendant of the God King must bear the fate of the desert, and rise above all its people like the sun.
To become that sun, one does not need great strength and charisma. One needs be of the right bloodline.
The people of the desert will follow the one who has proved that he is the successor of the bloodline, no matter how lowly that person may appear to be.
The most direct, sure way of proving such is by being chosen by Zaries.
In the past, when Cain bound his soul to the desert, the desert gave birth to Zaries which would act as the medium, the proof of the desert’s loyalty toward Cain. As Zaries always stays by Cain’s side and gives blessing of the desert to the worthy, one who is chosen by Zaries is most certainly recognized as the one blessed by the God King’s desert.
Zaries took a form of a bow, fell into a slumber, and waited for a descendant of the God King who would awaken its true form.

After passing the trial of the ancient God King, Zafir gained the ability to detect the soul of Zaries. Zafir, the chosen of Zaries, and the one accepted as the true descendant of the God King, heeds to the call of the God King, and makes his enemies tremble in fear with his might desert storm.

Rascal is an autonomous technomagic lifeform with free will, and is one of the wonders of Orvel.
However, Annette’s success with the creation of a technomagic lifeform brought heated discussions among scholars.
Discussions soon turned into debates, and later into conflicts.

Some claimed that Rascal’s existence is a treacherous act against the God, and that it should be eliminated at once, while others viewed Rascal as a miracle, a grand discovery, a salvation to the future of mankind.

Annette did not appreciate this conflict. She only wished to invent items that would help, protect, and make humans happy.
She had zero intention of unmaking Rascal. Rascal was her friend, her inventor partner, and a great assistant.
The source of Annette’s happiness was watching Rascal improve.
There was no way Annette would think about being separated from it.

Meanwhile, Rascal strives to upgrade itself more and more to please Annette who always watched it with a grand expectation...

Mad Engineer Landet is a legendary figure who is considered as the top engineer in the fields of technomagic, mechanical engineering, and many more.
However, he is also a man of extremely erratic personality, and so all workshops in the Empire refused to accept him into their group.

Landet called his creations his children, and treated them as if they were living beings with personalities.
If one wanted to make Landet get furious, he/she would abuse his creations, and use them for a purpose against Landet's will.

But there is a saying that an artisan’s creations harbor a soul within them.
Perhaps Landet wishes more than any artists to imbue soul into all his creations.
That engineer with a spirit of an artisan, after hearing Cecilia’s purpose and goals, offered his hands to Cecillia, and created the ultimate magnum opus with all his skills.

Supersonic Tempest, Gigantix: It is Cecilia’s soul mate, her partner which will boost Cecilia’s justice like a wing.

Cecilia, carrying with her strength, dream, and hope, charges heads on for true justice once again.

Akistra’s last mode was originally designed as a new gun turret, to be attached to the Empire’s new aircraft carrier during its development; however, the cannon required massive life energy to operate, and each activation would incapacitate dozens of ally soldiers. The weapon was deemed unfit for practical use, and after several attempts, was successfully modified to be activated with just one person’s life energy, at the cost of reduced firepower.\nDespite having its firepower significantly reduced, Akistra still places heavy burden on its user’s body, but its power is so mighty that some say it might even kill a God.\nWhen Crow first used Akistra, ‘Crow's life energy,’ a user authentication code registered by Rose, synchronized with Akistra's main core. As Crow accumulated his use of Akistra, the attunement rate increased gradually, leading to releasing the Akistra's lock, and although temporary, started awakening Akistra’s true power.

Whenever Artemia used her magic, she felt that she is indeed, the chosen.

During her young days, Artemia did not consider her staff special. However, as she witnessed how her staff drew the magic of light as if it was guiding the light, and how the power from the staff embraced her warmly, she started accepting the staff as not just a simple weapon, but as her most reliable companion.
-'As long as I have you in my hands, I am the most incandescent light that brilliantly lights the world.’
Just as she promised, Artemia felt the most reliable light from behind her.

And just like her, Brauxio thinks of Artemia earnestly.

The flame imbued inside Flenos was arrogant. Due to flame resistance Cleo had, she was able to endure the flame, but it had a risk of hurting her. Despite knowing this fact, Cleo pretended to ignore it, as she was confident that she will one day manage to make the flame hers, but also somewhat afraid of it.
However, when her arrogance was met with the wall of reality, Cleo humbly peered into the flame of herself. She wanted to accept the wild, fierce flame completely.

It was then when Flenos’ avatar made an advent, with the shape Cleo had yearned, as if it was greatly moved by Cleo’s will.

The very first Blue Dragon. In the ancient time, it had attuned all water of the world.
Cielamaha is the legacy of that dragon, a relic which Lilia considers most precious, and the strongest weapon she could fathom.
Lilia had never met the First Blue Dragon. The only thing she could do is to picture how the dragon would have looked like from his legacy that is Cielamaha.
One day, Lilia questioned herself: ‘Why did the First Blue Dragon create Cielamaha?’ It was a simple question, but was enough to stimulate her curiosity. The young dragon’s imagination flowed like a stream of water from a lake, and reached the conclusion nobody thought of: it awakened the water elemental residing in Cielamaha, an entity that accompanied the First Blue Dragon in the ancient times.
The awakened water elemental had a doubt on young Lilia’s potential, and on whether she was worthy of wielding Cielamaha.
Trials were given to her, yet she overcame them through the flexible use of water.

It then accepted Lilia, and now Lilia can harness a water tempest stronger than that of other Blue Dragons with the aid of the water elemental.

Laias, after the awakening from a 100-year slumber, she witnessed people suffering from invasion of the Demons that has begun again.
This sight reminded her of what she saw before her sleep: People were suffering, but all she could do was fall into a deep slumber.
It was the best Laias could do to prevent further suffering by stopping herself from turning into a Mad Dragon, but the decision remained as a tiny guilt to her.
Upon the awakening, Laias actively moved around to help the desert and its people; however this time again, she could not save people from Demons.
In her agony, Laias thought of Eltoirre, the ankh she was grasping. Eltoirre holds the power of water, circulation, and life. Perhaps she thought, if I could draw more power from Eltoirre, I may be able to help more people.
Laias immediately begun exploring the power within Eltoirre.
The moment when she realized that she had reached the bottom of Eltoirre’s power, an elegant phoenix of water appeared in front of Laias.

The true power of Eltoirre had been unleashed.

Rosmerta, an angel who loved mankind so much, to the point where she would entrust them with her own core. Although her power was weaker than that of Lua, her will to protect the ones she love was as strong as that of Goddess Lua.
'-Even if the goddess would abandon the humans, I will never stop protecting them. Even if that would lead to the denial of my existence...’
As Frey’s prayer accumulated, Rosmerta's will spread her wings and flew, as if it intended to break the silence.
The light resembled Lua yet different, but was as gentle and accommodating as the goddess.

As long as Frey prays for love, Rosmerta will always heed her calls and rain down her blessing upon Frey and the ones she loves.

The truth of creation is engraved unto the sky. All places were influenced by Lua, life and the truth of creation existed there.

The truth points toward the goddess’ will, and Benedicia is the sacred flag that carries Lua’s will, purging those that oppose the goddess. It is Lua’s warning and crusade against evil, and a sacred soul that shines ever-bright to evangelize Lua’s will even to those afar.
Benedicia, as a holy gear that carries with it the memory and faith of all flagbearers that held it through the history, takes a form of a righteous knight that warns and smites those foolish enough to oppose the goddess.

Zaunlang is an archfiend, one of the powerful entities that forged a familiar pact with the Shadow Hilt family.
It is known that its skill in blades surpasses its innate talent in sorcery.
Innate spiritual energy flows through the blade, blooming purple cloud and dissipating hallucinatory image of the enemy upon swinging.
As unique Zaunlang is, it does not lend its power to anyone, but it responded and lent its power to Seria when she swore to slay her blood sister, Erze.

When Erze was presented with eternal thirst by the vampires, she instead killed them and absorbed their power. Perion, an essence created by this incident, was a small and weak sphere then.\nHowever, Erze’s hidden talent transformed this sphere into an item that cycles itself to quench Erze’s eternal thirst, and manifest the quenched thirst in a form of greed and strength.\nHer thirst exacerbated boundlessly, and eventually, even her mixed feeling toward her sister started to seep into the vortex of an endless cycle. Perion decided to aid Erze, and now it attempts to break its vessel to reborn into a new form.

Even in death, Mad Dragon Svelta’s soul did not fully rest in peace.
His rage and resentment lingered in Yanne’s greatbow, and let out a cry of destruction.
However, after spending years as Yanne’s weapon, Svelta’s soul acquired the ability to control its anger which had been slowly eating away its mind.

Perhaps it was because Svelta’s soul had touches with Demons and Mad Dragons that Yanne had hunted for years.
Gradually, it learned the ability to understand the nature of those who had to face the Mad Dragon’s anger.
Not all the creations of the world deserved anger.
Demons, Mad Dragons, evil creatures, and the corrupted beings were the ones that had to be destroyed.

Svelta’s soul attained serenity, and it communed with Yanne’s soul.
Now the soul of the Mad Dragon shares the same path with the dragon slayer of the dragon heritage.

For inciting the wrath of the Gods, technomagic civilization cannot avoid the punishment of calamity.

Some turned their eyes onto the space where Gods cannot reach, while some had thoughts on immortality, and some, after deep agonizing, made weapons of destruction to confront the Gods.

However, the time is short.
If we wish to preserve the future as well as the present, we should look for other ways as well.
Our achievement, our knowledge, and our wisdom are treasures which should be passed on to our scions.
To protect our treasures, we have no choice but to engineer technology which can even outlast the fury of the Gods.

The purpose of the Project K.A.R.A. is to create an artificial intelligence with unlimited potential that can protect future engineers, our technology, and our knowledge.
An artificial intelligence with a shape and mind of a human that can be easily accepted anywhere else.
K.A.R.A. will grow, and become endlessly stronger if it meets the one with an engineer’s blood.

And they.. will be the foundation that will retain the Technomagic Kingdom.

This is our legacy.

This is our only gift we can pass on to the future generations.

- Memoir of Dr. Ignio
- Project K.A.R.A Archive

Tamian Tribe had trained many Spiritual Guides. Kurulati was the lamp the guides used to guide the spirits. These are the extent of what Rephy knows after a conversation with the chief.
However, what guides and even chiefs did not know, was that memories of guides have been piling up inside Kurulati.
That applied to Rephy as well, but one day, Rephy realized that there was other voice among the voices of spirits.
The voices were unfamiliar, yet strangely familiar at the same time.
After listening to the lamp carefully, and talking to the voice, Rephy found out that the voice came from the entity which is the cumulative of memories of all previous guides.
The entity told Rephy of what all the guides had experienced, and upon hearing them, Rephy gained deeper understanding of the power of Kurulati which even he did not know.
The lamp shined brighter, and lost spirits could find their way to the lamp more easily through that warm light.

Made of a massive amount of refined Mana Stones, Mahitra was more than capable of handling Aisha’s mana that earned the title of 'Violet.'

Born with a noble destiny, and also as a child of Daphnel von, a great noble family of Orvel, she has used Mahitra sometimes to aid the weak, sometimes for the honor of her family, and sometimes to fulfill her duty as an archmage.

One day, while she was using Mahitra, Aisha discovered an interesting phenomenon. Whenever Aisha uses her mana, Mahitra would react to it as if it was a living being, and change the flow of mana to harness its power more efficiently. 

Upon discussing the matter with Annette, the creator of Mahitra, Aisha learned that her will and her mana seeped into Mahitra’s mana stone, modifying Mahitra to something like a technomagic lifeform. Aisha decided to research this new phenomenon.

Even though it was developed as an experimental weapon, Matimaruma proved to be quite potent.
Rehartna, however, was not satisfied and continued to research ways to improve Matimaruma.
Rehartna, of course, did not just only look for ways to improve its firepower.
Although Rehartna has many side jobs, her main job was nonetheless, an artisan of instruments. Her pride as an artisan did not allow her to craft just a simple tool of mediocre quality.
Although making a tool that is both a great instrument and a great weapon proved to be a challenge that demanded patience and effort, that didn't bother Rehartna who was determined to help her comrades.
As Rehartna continued making various instruments, she thought to herself that it’s about time she made an instrument that is capable of producing the grandest richest sound in the world:
The instrument that can play the whole orchestra, a pipe organ. The research did not end, and there were many failures along the way.
However, Rehartna prevailed and created a pipe organ of her dreams that can withstand everything.
The melody filled the room, and its sound carried a warmth that even Rehartna never felt before.
Rehartna was sure of it.
She was sure that the pipe organ she had created is a masterpiece, worthy of being called her magnum opus.
The organ watched Rehartna as she cried out of happiness.
The stars of dawn were shining upon the organ.

In the beginning, all Glenwys wanted to do was to protect the people of her village.
Glenwys always felt that it was just pure luck to get a chance to get her skills recognized, and always wondered if she was worthy of the title: ‘Hope of Commoners.’
Glenwys could not cease wondering even when using Maxithea, a gift from the imperial palace.
The Empire’s specialty was technomagic, and while the technology was quite common, only the rich had the privilege to use weapons that utilized technomagic. Glenwys felt that Maxithea was too good for someone like her who used to swing old rusty swords. As Glenwys swung Maxithea, she always thought that she neither deserved a weapon like Maxithea, her place, nor the excessive praises. 

This was the exact reason why Maxithea chose Glenwys. There was a long-lived myth that Maxithea, the sturdiest shield of the Empire, contained the soul of a guardian taking the form of a blue lion. For a long time, Maxithea had been waiting for someone unprivileged who would always think, and strive to get better at every occasion.
The nobles that wielded Maxithea were all privileged from birth, so they did not have to think or strive to grow.

Maxithea wanted someone who could grow stronger by overcoming their fears or concerns like a sword that goes through constant welding and tempering. It did not want someone complete. It wanted someone who has the potential to get better along with itself by overcoming his/her self-doubt and questions. It only asked for Glenwys' determination, and in return, swore to bestow her with greater power and a better future.

An Ether that emits great energy by absorbing the power of a soul to the extreme.
